example_reviews: The banh mi shop has air conditioning to eat on the spot and delicious salted coffee to suit your taste. The shop is small, clean, and has comfortable seating. If you have the opportunity, you will come back.

Nha Viet is an excellent spot for Bahn Mi and coffee lovers! The food was delicious, packed with authentic flavors, and the coffee was just perfect. The ambiance of the restaurant is warm and welcoming, making it an ideal place to relax and enjoy a meal. Additionally, it's very tourist-friendly with staff who are accommodating and attentive. Whether you're a local or a visitor, this is a must-visit spot for a great dining experience.

After I had eaten lunch I came here for coffee. I haven’t had coconut coffee before so I came here to try my first coconut coffee. All the coworkers are so friendly and kind. One of the workers could even speak Korean very fluently which is my homeland language. It was heartwarming to have someone speak to me in my home language. The coconut coffee was also amazing. It came with a separate shot of espresso that you can pour onto the coconut drink. It was very tasty. Before I left I had wanted to try another coffee so I bought the Saigon milk coffee. The person who took my order is so nice and friendly. Sadly today is my last day here I will definitely come back to try the bahn Mi sandwiches next time!

name: Bếp Lụa Restaurant
address: 94 Bạch Đằng, Da Nang 550000 Vietnam
description: Bếp Lụa Vietnamese food restaurant. Say no to advertising, bring the taste and quality of Vietnamese food to customers
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Da Nang
Street Food Restaurants in Da Nang
Japanese Restaurants for Lunch in Da Nang
example_reviews: If you are looking for a nice place to start sampling local cuisine try here. Really helpful and food excellent (we cheated as we had tried some dishes we ordered here during a hanoi street food tour). They really couldn’t be more helpful - vegetarian food as well if you ask for the menu

The food is delicious, well-seasoned, and made from fresh ingredients. Their dishes is absolutely amazing! The dipping sauce is flavorful, perfectly complementing every bite. Definitely coming back for more!
Amazing food and such a cozy restaurant! The people who work there delivered incredibly good service! Recommend everyone to stop by and have a lunch.

name: Olivia's Prime Steakhouse
address: 74 Bach Dang, Hai Chau 1 Ward Unit G1-G4, the Ground Floor, Da Nang 550000 Vietnam
description: The family-owned and only Michelin Guide Selected Steakhouse in Da Nang. Newly built, fully air-conditioned restaurant specializing in cooking over a wood-fired grill. We serve Japanese A5 Wagyu, USDA Prime, Premium Australian grain-fed beef, as well as Australian lamb. We also serve pork, chicken, home-made pork and beef sausages, and other specialty foods, all cooked over a wood-fired grill. Our salads are made with the freshest greens and our home made salad dressings. Good selection of wines from around the world at reasonable prices and wines by the glass. Round off your meal with our grandma's desserts. We take pride in our food, service, and staff.
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Da Nang
Street Food Restaurants in Da Nang
example_reviews: We came to Olivia's Prime Steakhouse to celebrate our girl's birthday after search many Da Nang fine dining restaurants. We ordered salad, chicken bbq, ribeye steaks. Salad was fresh, chicken bbq was delicious and steaks were fresh, wonderful and cooked as our request. I have never had such delicious steaks before. They use wood grill instead of gas grill like other restaurants, that is why the steaks are so special. Staffs were very attentive to take care of our group. They offered a free cake for birthday and also chocolate vodka for everyone at the end. Although it was pricey but we both agreed that it was worth: luxury restaurant, 5 star service, perfectly cooked steaks - can not expect more. Many thanks for hosting our group. Sure to go back. Highly recommended.

Wow, what a culinary delight! Olivia's Steakhouse in Da Nang exceeded our expectations in every way. The steaks were cooked to perfection - tender, juicy, and full of flavor. The lamb cutlets were equally impressive, with a beautiful char on the outside and a deliciously pink interior. But what really made our experience stand out was the exceptional service. Our server was attentive, knowledgeable, and friendly, making great recommendations and ensuring our glasses were always full. The atmosphere was sophisticated yet cozy, making it perfect for a special occasion or a night out with friends. We can't wait to come back and indulge in Olivia's incredible steaks again. 5 stars isn't enough - we'd give it 10 stars if we could!

Was craving a steak and found this place through google, food and drinks were great and service was also excellent. Steaks are very expensive but all the beef is imported from Australia, USA and Japan so it’s expected other non steak meals are reasonably priced. Would happily go back 👍

name: Bistecca Restaurant Da Nang
address: 20 Dong Da Street 7F New Orient Hotel, Thuan Phuoc Ward, Da Nang 550000 Vietnam
description: I had an amazing experience at this restaurant! The food was absolutely delicious, with flavors that were perfectly balanced and beautifully presented. The staff were friendly and attentive, making sure we had everything we needed for a great dining experience. The ambiance was warm and inviting, making it a perfect spot to relax and enjoy a meal. Highly recommended – I’ll definitely be coming back!
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Da Nang
Street Food Restaurants in Da Nang
European Restaurants with Private Dining in Da Nang
Romantic French Restaurants in Da Nang
German Restaurants for Lunch in Da Nang
example_reviews: I had an amazing experience at this restaurant! The food was absolutely delicious, with flavors that were perfectly balanced and beautifully presented. The staff were friendly and attentive, making sure we had everything we needed for a great dining experience. The ambiance was warm and inviting, making it a perfect spot to relax and enjoy a meal. Highly recommended – I’ll definitely be coming back!

Very swanky restaurant on the river side of Da Nang. Probably one of the quickest dinner services I’ve ever experienced for a higher end establishment, with no complaints. Thought it was odd that they were playing Christmas music, being that it’s early April… friendly and attentive staff. The wagyu was my favorite dish of the evening, along with the yuzu cake. It wasn’t too sweet and the perfect tartness. Thought the pizza was a miss… the cheese was a bit too thick and hardened fairly quick.

Everything here is wonderful. Extremely friendly staff from the waiter, manager to the chef. Delicious food, clean restaurant, top view, quiet and luxurious space. And the prices are very reasonable for everything here and in my opinion it's quite cheap. Well, if you come here, if you want to live virtual, you don't have to worry about anyone taking pictures. The staff proactively helped me and was very happy and enthusiastic. I didn't expect it. The day I went, Chau served me. The advice on dishes and types of service was very attentive, my birthday was even more perfect. In general, I can only thank you very much and wish the restaurant to always develop ❤️

name: Cardi Pizzeria Bạch Đằng
address: 124 Bạch Đằng Phường Hải Châu 1, Da Nang 55000 Vietnam
description: Premium Steak & Pizza Certified Imported Steak, Fresh Italian Standard Pizza, Premium Wine Cellar Millionaire Han River view.
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Da Nang
Street Food Restaurants in Da Nang
South American Restaurants for Lunch in Da Nang
Spanish Restaurants for Lunch in Da Nang
example_reviews: I ordered margherita pizza, T-bone steak, and carbonara, and I recommend the steak the most! I ordered it medium and it was well cooked and good. The sauce that came with the steak was also delicious. I came around 11:30 a.m. on a weekday, there were hardly any people and the food came out quickly.

We had dinner two nights, the food was delicious. We have ordered pizzas, two varieties one day and two varieties another day and they were all delicious. The two waitresses who served us on the two different days were both wonderful. We sat at the top and at night you could see the entire river with views of the ships. It was a super nice experience One of the girls was trying to speak in Spanish which we found very nice. Thank you very much, highly recommended place in terms of quality, price and location.

While in Da Nang, Vietnam on vacation my friend, and I decided stop in at the Cardi Pizzeria on Bach Dang, which we learned is one of 4 Cardi Pizzerias located there. We’re so glad we did, because we ended up having a delightful encounter with their wonderful waitress, Anna. She began by greeting us with a big smile, and a lot of enthusiasm. To our great relief, since we speak no Vietnamese, she spoke excellent English, so we asked her how she had learned to speak it so well. She told us she had learned it on her own, mostly by watching American movies, which was quite a surprise. When taking our orders, she repeated them back to us, word for word, to verify them, which demonstrated her professional attention to detail. Unlike most other places we’ve eaten at, throughout Southeast Asia, she delivered our food, and drinks together, which was another nice, and very welcome touch that we were grateful for. We each had a small pizza, which is just about the perfect size for one person. I had a coconut smoothie that was absolutely fantastic, but I can’t remember what my friend had to drink. Anna was attentive, outgoing, personable, friendly, and quite frankly, very refreshing. We ended up having a somewhat lengthy conversation, interspersed with lots of laughter. Anna’s an excellent waitress, and it’s obvious that she enjoys her job, because her happy-go-lucky attitude shines through. By the time we finished eating, and left, we felt we’d had a good meal, and found a new friend. If you’re ever in Da Nang, and stop in at the Cardi Pizzeria on Bach Dang, and you’re lucky enough to have Anna as your waitress, you’ll be able to make some marvelous memories, while having a thoroughly enjoyable experience. Our only regret is that we had such a fun time, that we forgot to get a selfie with Anna to memorialize our time there. I think it’ll be okay, though, because we’ll make sure to remember to do it the next time we stop in.

name: Banh Xeo Cuoi - Ha Noi Egg Coffee
address: 29 Phan Tôn, Da Nang 50000 Vietnam
description: We are proud to offer traditional Vietnamese dishes in premium versions. All dishes are made by hand to retain the original flavor arranged in a cozy space. We has selected typical dishes of 3 regions: North - Central - South to introduce to you. The most special thing that makes "Bánh Xèo Cuội" different from others is that Bánh Xèo is made from rice flour ground in the traditional way, while most other restaurants prefer using industrial rice flour because of its convenience. This helps us create the crispy texture and special delicious flavour of Bánh Xèo that you can hardly find elsewhere!
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Da Nang
Street Food Restaurants in Da Nang
German Restaurants for Lunch in Da Nang
Greek Restaurants for Lunch in Da Nang
example_reviews: The restaurant offers hand-crafted traditional dishes in a premium setting. We tried the Seafood Fried Rice and Crab Spring Rolls - both absolutely delicious. The Vietnamese coffee selection is impressive, with the salted coffee providing an interesting contrast to the sweet egg coffee. The attentive service and lovely music created a relaxing atmosphere perfect for couples. A must-visit for authentic Vietnamese cuisine in Da Nang!

This is a restaurant with a bright cafe atmosphere. Although located off the street, the environment is very clean and the staff are friendly and uninhibited, so enjoy a comfortable dining experience here. Korean green bean pancakes are crisp and tender on the outside, with a rich meat filling that complements vegetables, rice paper and fish sauce. The watermelon served later was also very refreshing, adding a pleasant ending to the meal.

This cozy restaurant was such a great find! The food here was absolutely phenomenal! The texture of the pancakes here reminded me of my mama’s pancakes from when I was little, which left me feeling very nostalgic. Every dish I tried was delicious. The restaurant was very clean. The service was fast. The staff was very friendly and helpful; my non-Vietnamese speaking friend was explained about each dish he inquired. The hostess spoke perfect English. I would recommend everyone to try this place! 10/10!

name: Cabanon Palace
address: 27-29 Loseby Street Cordial Grand Hotel 21st Floor, Son Tra, Da Nang 550000 Vietnam
description: FRENCH RESTAURANT & ROOFTOP WINE BAR Experience an authentic french culinary dinner at Cabanon Palace restaurant: a family legacy of tastes and traditions, proud of the authentic flavors from French Riviera.
cuisines: Street Food Restaurants in Da Nang
Fast Food Restaurants in Da Nang
Romantic Italian Restaurants in Da Nang
Late Night Mediterranean Restaurants in Da Nang
example_reviews: It was a special meal to celebrate my birthday. The oysters were particularly good as well as the crab bisque. The chef took time to chat to all diners, explaining the restaurant’s history, full menu and suggested wine pairings. Whilst not the cheapest place in town the standard of service, food and general experience was definitely value-for-money.

I ate at Cabanon Palace just before Covid hit and it was amazing. They've moved location, but the food is still fantastic (phew). The perfect place for an anniversary dinner. We started with Fois Gras, followwing some delicious canapes. The Fois Gras was perfectly cooked which can be an issue in VN. We followed with a Steak and Stuffed Squid. Both delicious. A must do if you are in Da Nang!

Amazing food, wonderful service. Started with some freshly shucked French oysters and foi grois. The hanger steak was perfectly cooked - so much flavour and beautifully tender. Paired with amazing handcut chips and a jus that was a major highlight. Lobster bisque sauce with scampi and cote de boef an interesting and wonderful combination. Some calvados before dessert helped clear our stomachs for the French cheesecake, an old family recipe (paired with a beautifully balanced sorbet). Could not recommend this restaurant enough , very authentic and extremely well priced for the quality of food. Every dish was very well thought out and considered, and the service was welcoming and knowledgeable. Also a very good wine list with many great French reds that do not break the bank.

name: Lan Gio Restaurant
address: 169 Tran Phu, Da Nang 550000 Vietnam
description: Located in the heart of Da Nang, on Tran Phu Street, Làn Gió Restaurant combines modern elegance with traditional Vietnamese charm to create a high-end dining experience. We proudly offer authentic Vietnamese cuisine and innovative fusion dishes, all crafted with the freshest locally sourced ingredients. Enjoy a relaxing and cozy dining atmosphere enhanced by warm rattan lighting and sophisticated interiors.
cuisines: Street Food Restaurants in Da Nang
Fast Food Restaurants in Da Nang
French Restaurants for Breakfast in Da Nang
German Restaurants for Lunch in Da Nang
Greek Restaurants for Lunch in Da Nang
example_reviews: Lan Gio offers an exceptional fusion dining experience that merges Chinese and Vietnamese cuisines. The restaurant’s seafood dishes stand out for their freshness and creativity, while the smaller appetizers, such as the delightful money bags, are both light and flavorful. The service at Lan Gio is commendable; the staff are attentive The restaurant's interior is also noteworthy, featuring a beautiful, warm design. Located near the scenic Han River, Lan Gio is ideally situated for anyone in Da Nang looking to enjoy a meal in a prime location. Additionally, it offers affordable pricing, making it an accessible choice for both locals and visitors. Highly recommend stopping by to try this experience.

Lan Gio Dam Da Huong is a fantastic Vietnamese restaurant that truly stands out! The food is absolutely excellent, with authentic flavors and fresh ingredients that make every dish a delight. The staff is incredibly friendly and attentive, always ready to help with a smile. What’s more, the prices are very reasonable, offering great value for such high-quality meals. Highly recommend this spot for anyone craving delicious Vietnamese cuisine in a warm and welcoming atmosphere!

Fabulous Vietnamese restaurant just opposite the Pink cathedral in bustling and super noisy Da Nang. Beaten by unusually strong wind and busy rush hour streets, we found a sanctuary of peace, serenity, warm smiles, wonderful hospitality and delicious food. Very nice minimal decoration- which is super pleasant for the eye after all the colourful lanterns and illumination around- pleasant instrumental music, very generous portions charged with taste and flavours. I would absolutely recommend it for any traveller! A small touch - they even have bamboo baskets for lady purse:-)

name: Nhà Bếp Xưa
address: 64 Hà Bỗng phường Phước Mỹ  quận Sơn Trà tp Đà Nẵng, Da Nang 550000 Vietnam
description: Food is delicious and reasonable price, staffs are helpful and gave a good recommendation. The owner is very nice. We found this place accidentally but not disappointed at all, even the seats are busy but food came out pretty quick, tables were full but we waited less than 10 mins and food are hot and freshly cooked
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Da Nang
Street Food Restaurants in Da Nang
Eastern European Restaurants for Lunch in Da Nang
Romantic Fusion Restaurants in Da Nang
example_reviews: Food is delicious and reasonable price, staffs are helpful and gave a good recommendation. The owner is very nice. We found this place accidentally but not disappointed at all, even the seats are busy but food came out pretty quick, tables were full but we waited less than 10 mins and food are hot and freshly cooked

I went there because it seemed easy to enter near the hotel. The menu says this is a bestseller, so I asked for the bestseller pho on the very first page. Seasoning was my favorite. The passion fruit juice was delicious. The service is good. The cold tea was also delicious. I went there at about 5:30 and it was empty, but around 6:00 the crowd kept coming in and it was full.

We loved this place and went back twice. The Pho, Mi Quang and Prawn spring rolls were stand outs. Service is excellent, prices are terrific and the place really shows off a variety of Vietnamese dishes. I put the stand outs in but we really loved all the dishes, including Sweet and Sour Pork, Braised Pork, Spring Rolls and Chicken Wings. We would go back again if we were not leaving. Go early to avoid the queue for a table. A stand out of our 2 weeks trip.

name: TinTin Seafood Restaurant
address: 100 Pham Van Dong Street, Da Nang 50409 Vietnam
description: TinTin Seafood & Bar Da Nang is the perfect destination for seafood lovers, offering a wide variety of the freshest and finest live seafood. From lobsters, crabs, fish to unique seafood delicacies, all are prepared fresh on-site, ensuring the most delicious and flavorful dishes. Whether you are looking for a traditional seafood platter or something special, TinTin has something for everyone. In addition to our outstanding seafood, we also offer a luxurious karaoke space for you to unwind and enjoy time with friends, family, or colleagues. The restaurant is also an ideal venue for hosting parties, birthdays, and gatherings, with a spacious, cozy atmosphere and full amenities. Come to TinTin Seafood & Bar to indulge in a memorable seafood feast and fun-filled karaoke moments with your loved ones. We promise an unforgettable experience that combines high-quality seafood, entertainment, and lasting memories!
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Da Nang
Street Food Restaurants in Da Nang
example_reviews: The service was excellent, they were very attentive and even offered to shell the prawns for us. Like me, the staff was incredibly polite, spoke excellent English, and made excellent recommendations. In addition, the location was spotless. The lobsters at TinTin Seafood Restaurant are huge, live, and caught right from the tank. They are so fresh and delicious, and they are very reasonably priced and the overall atmosphere is very beautiful. I highly recommend TinTin Seafood Restaurant to anyone who wants to enjoy a delicious and memorable meal.

TinTin Seafood Restaurant is hands down one of the best seafood restaurants I've ever been to. I ordered a 1.2 kg grilled lobster that cost a little over $50. The food was prepared with care, and the grilled lobster was cooked perfectly. The meat was firm, delicious, and fresh. The staff even helped me peel the lobster, which I really appreciated. I was very satisfied with the service here. Everything was excellent, from the atmosphere to the staff.

The best seafood restaurant in Da Nang After receiving a recommendation from an acquaintance, I made a reservation directly through Google Maps. It's very convenient with free pick-up service to the hotel. As soon as you get out of the car, employees will wait in front of the door and guide you with a large parasol. The menu is written in various languages, making it easy to understand and order without a translator. The seafood in each dish was very fresh, and when I personally selected the lobster from the aquarium, they not only cooked it deliciously, but also prepared it so it was easy to eat, so I was satisfied with both the taste and the service. The store has a spacious and cozy atmosphere, and the private VIP room is equipped with karaoke facilities, so it was even better to enjoy drinking and singing together. There is a massage shop on the second floor, and the staff skillfully massages the desired area and intensity according to your needs, so your fatigue is completely relieved. This place has the advantage of offering a full course including meals, drinks, and massage. All of the people I went with had a delicious meal and were satisfied, so I plan to visit again when I travel again. If you travel to Da Nang, I highly recommend you go there. I think it will soon be selected as a Michelin 5-star restaurant.

name: Golden Meat House
address: 100 Tran Bach Dang, Da Nang 550000 Vietnam
description: Golden Meat House - Stone Grill BBQ & Meat Shop For those who love barbecue, immediately come to Golden Meat House Barbecue Restaurant at 100 Tran Bach Dang, Da Nang to enjoy delicious grilled dishes processed right on the stone table. Combined with grilled dishes are tofu soup, kimchi soup with pork, steamed egg coming with aromatic and richly sweet flavor, filling warm stomach in the cold Fall and Winter. Golden Meat House Barbecue Restaurant: Airy and large space. Unique and modern interior. Fresh and premium materials. Best place to dine with your passion for BBQ cuisine in general and Korean cuisine in particular. Golden Meat House - Stone Grill BBQ & Meat Shop Opening hours: 10:00 ~ 22:00
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Da Nang
Street Food Restaurants in Da Nang
Italian Restaurants for Large Groups in Da Nang
Japanese Restaurants for Lunch in Da Nang
example_reviews: I had an amazing experience at this Korean BBQ restaurant! The staff was incredibly friendly and attentive, making sure we felt comfortable the entire time. The food was absolutely delicious — the meat was fresh and perfectly seasoned, and the variety of dishes really impressed me. The ambiance was also great with a beautiful view, which made the meal even more enjoyable. As it was March 8th, they also gave flowers to all the women, which was such a lovely gesture! Overall, everything was perfect, and I would rate it 10/10. Highly recommend!

This is the most premium samgyup barbecue place I’ve ever been to. The staff are very, very accommodating. Each table gets a dedicated server who cooks the meat for you, so all you have to do is sit back and enjoy. It really makes you feel pampered while you eat, like you’re getting dinner and a show at the same time! Everything was so yummy, and the quality of the food really stood out. As expected, it’s expensive, but you definitely feel like you’re paying for a premium experience. I really enjoyed it!

We had a fantastic dining experience at Golden Meat House! From the moment we arrived, the staff were incredibly welcoming and attentive — always ready to assist with grilling, give recommendations, and ensure we were comfortable throughout our meal. Their service was top-notch and made us feel well taken care of. The food was equally impressive. Every cut of meat was fresh, well-marinated, and full of flavor — especially the pork belly and beef short ribs. The side dishes were generous and delicious, and the overall quality of the ingredients really stood out. Golden Meat House is a must-visit for Korean BBQ lovers. Great service, excellent food, and a warm atmosphere — we’ll definitely be back!

name: Riverside Terrace Restaurant
address: 493 Đ. Trần Hưng Đạo, Da Nang 550000 Vietnam
description: Your home away from home. Comfort food straight from the heart of Italy. Let us take care of you just like Mamma would!
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Da Nang
Street Food Restaurants in Da Nang
Late Night BBQ Restaurants in Da Nang
example_reviews: PLEASE VISIT! This is an absolute gem of a restaurant. The food was delicious from start to finish, staff were absolutely brilliant and the owner was so kind to come round with the biggest smile on his face checking how our food was. He told us all about his restaurant and even offered us a table on the top rooftop floor so we could get a superb view of the dragon bridge. The team were absolutely fantastic! My partner and I couldn’t recommend this place any more! Thank you team!

A home run. Owner Carmen is charming. Food was excellent. Bonus: view of dragon bridge from roof top dining area. We ordered: bruschetta, pumpkin soup, pasta carbonara, pasta bolognese, and the tiramisu. All authentic and delicious. The menu doesn’t say what the house red wine is but Carmen said it was a Merlot from Sicily. The meal cost somewhat higher than traditional Vietnamese food but less than you’d pay in the West. Also: paper, not plastic,straw used :)

Halfway through our trip we could not resist the temptation to eat Italian and we decided to try this place and.... surprise!!! We really found a place that made us feel really at home! Credit to the kitchen made with quality products, and the Owner who welcomed us and made us feel like lifelong friends! Super recommended, to feel at home and why not to make friends as happened to us!!!

name: Ari Sushi - Japanese Sushi Restaurant
address: 268 Võ Nguyên Giáp, Phường Mỹ An, Quận Ngũ Hành Sơn, Đà Nẵng, Việt Nam, Da Nang Vietnam
description:
Super delicious! We had fried rice, sushi, and karaage – everything was a solid 10 out of 10. The staff is super friendly and the atmosphere is really pleasant. I’ve been in Da Nang since April 7th, 2025, and this was already my second time here this week. Don’t miss out on the chance – definitely come and eat here if you’re in Da Nang!

Super delicious! We had Fried Rice, Sushi and Karaage – everything was a smooth 10 out of 10. The staff is super friendly and the atmosphere very pleasant. I have been here in Da Nang since April 7th, 25 and have been here for the second time this week. Don’t miss the chance and definitely stop by when you’re in Da Nang!
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Da Nang
Street Food Restaurants in Da Nang
example_reviews: Super delicious! We had fried rice, sushi, and karaage – everything was a solid 10 out of 10. The staff is super friendly and the atmosphere is really pleasant. I’ve been in Da Nang since April 7th, 2025, and this was already my second time here this week. Don’t miss out on the chance – definitely come and eat here if you’re in Da Nang! Super delicious! We had Fried Rice, Sushi and Karaage – everything was a smooth 10 out of 10. The staff is super friendly and the atmosphere very pleasant. I have been here in Da Nang since April 7th, 25 and have been here for the second time this week. Don’t miss the chance and definitely stop by when you’re in Da Nang!

This is just the best sushi we've ever had! Just super tender rice, delicious fish, just a delight, everything is so fresh and delicious! I highly recommend this place for Japanese food lovers! We went together with the baby and she ate it all with pleasure! And a very nice girl waiter.

Amazing premium quality shabu and sushi. Price is more than affordable compared to Bangkok. Service is very friendly and helpful. Fish is really fresh and beef is soft. The atmosphere is relaxing and not crowded. So far this is my favourite place to eat in Da Nang

name: Brilliant Restaurant
address: 178 Ho Nghinh An Hai Bac, Son Tra, Da Nang 550000 Vietnam
description: With the design emphasized on the longstanding rice civilization of the ancient Vietnamese, stepping into Brilliant Restaurant, you will have the opportunity to immerse yourself in the cultural space and national cuisine. Brilliant Restaurant aims to become a cuisine center in the heart of Danang, collecting the culinary essence of Asian countries in harmony with the traditional cuisine of Vietnam.
cuisines: Street Food Restaurants in Da Nang
Fast Food Restaurants in Da Nang
Thai Restaurants for Large Groups in Da Nang
Late Night Vietnamese Restaurants in Da Nang
American Restaurants for Large Groups in Da Nang
example_reviews: A large, charming and well decorated restaurant which offers a wide range of fresh fish, shellfish and shellfish. Here, you simply choose the cooking method and pay the price based on the weight of the chosen animal. Prices per kilo are displayed directly on the aquariums and the waitresses tell you directly the final prices according to the quantity chosen. The staff is very pleasant and smiling. An excellent experience and exceptional products!

Da Nang is full of seafood restaurants, so I was wondering where to go, but I decided to go here because the atmosphere looked good. We went in November without a reservation for two people, but we were able to sit at the open table on the first floor. It's a huge restaurant with the whole building as a restaurant, so it seems that you don't need to make a reservation. The casual yet high-class atmosphere was great. You choose the fish from the fish tank. There are pictures on the menu, so I think it's best to choose the food you want to eat and then the fish. Most of the staff can speak English and are kind. The menu is well-written, so it's fine even if you only speak Japanese. We ordered a bottle of wine and a la carte dishes, and it cost about 10,000 yen for two people in Japanese yen. I think it would be more expensive if you ordered shrimp or something. The streets around here are lively, so you can take a stroll on your way home or stop by a beach bar.

It's a very delicious restaurant. It was so delicious that I went there for dinner three days. My was very kind and told me about the market price of seafood, so even Japanese people can feel at ease. If you don't eat the market price, it will cost about 5,000 yen for two people. On the last day, we had a luxurious lobster meal and it cost about 12,000 yen. The portions are large, so a small size is enough for two people. I want to go again. Thank you My 😊

name: Ezi Legend Of The Sea
address: 298 Võ Nguyên Giáp, Da Nang 550000 Vietnam
description: We are a traditional coffee and sandwich shop in Da Nang + Iced milk coffee with filter + Iced black coffee with filter + Iced silver coffee + Egg coffee + Grilled meat sandwich + Fish sausage sandwich
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Da Nang
Street Food Restaurants in Da Nang
American Restaurants for Lunch in Da Nang
Asian Restaurants with Buffet in Da Nang
example_reviews: Lovely place, very friendly, lovely decoration, good English and delicious coffee and fresh juices. Highly recommended, and right by the beach.
Best coffee ever in the best neighbourhood! Chocolate taste with cacao. Just perfect😎They can make it hot or cold. As you wish. Great place also with natural wood. Very original

name: Wild Rice
address: 6 Ngo Thi Nham Street, Phan Chu Trinh Ward, Hoan Kiem District, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
description: Not sure why our tour company booked us here.  The food was just average.  The service was fine but the meal felt rushed.  With so many really great places to eat in Hanoi had I known this was where we were going I would have booked someplace else independently.
cuisines: South American Restaurants for Lunch in Hanoi
example_reviews: Not sure why our tour company booked us here. The food was just average. The service was fine but the meal felt rushed. With so many really great places to eat in Hanoi had I known this was where we were going I would have booked someplace else independently.
We had a multi course meal here with a large group of people. The seafood soup was excellent. All of the dishes served were well prepared. The staff was attentive and helpful.

Visited as part of a tour group, so had a set Dinner Menu provided. There are lots of courses but thankfully they are not too large. I am sure there were Spring Rolls, soup, rice, vegetables ,fish , chicken ,meat , noodles , followed by fresh fruit & coffee / tea. We were a group of 23, service was good but fairly fast. Had we just been a couple we would rather have taken another 30 minutes or so over our dinner.

name: Leo's - Cocktails & Co.
address: 16 Lo Su street 2nd Floor, Hanoi Vietnam
description: Discover a cozy cocktail bar nestled in an ancient Hanoi house, steps from Hoan Kiem lake. Handcrafted cocktails with only the freshest local ingredients created by our welcoming crew. Come see why we are a local favorite!
cuisines: BBQ Restaurants for Lunch in Hanoi
example_reviews: This cocktail bar is beautiful with a classic and cozy atmosphere. The menu is diverse, from classic to modern cocktails, all delicious and attractive. Service staff are friendly, professional and always willing to advise customers. Prices are affordable compared to the quality, creating an enjoyable and memorable experience for anyone who visits.

On our last night we found this little gem of a place, perfect (and I mean PERFECT) cocktails. Its tucked away on a quiet street but this should be sometging to add to your trip! The manager Thuong was an absolute star and so helpful, knowledgeable and welcoming and so we're the other staff. I can't wait to come back here! 😍

The best handcrafted cocktails in the city! My friends and I stumbled upon this place after we had an evening walk by the river. We only came in for one drink but ended up having 6+ drinks. All the drinks on the menu are so good but best drinks were created by Lee, who was our bartender. He is so talented and is able to concoct any cocktails to our preference. All the servers there were really fun and cool. Ask for the one to beatbox and do magic card tricks. This cool and chill bar is one of the best cocktail places we’ve ever been to. We will be back for sure. Highly recommend coming here!

name: Rue Du Camp Cafe & Bistro
address: 50 Trang Thi Hoan Kiem, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
description: From Arabica coffee beans nourished in soil with fragrant aroma of roasted fire, processed into elegance Italian coffee cups; To quintessential bowls of Chicken Pho in the luxury atmosphere or the green pearls color of the soup from Vong village, bearing the essence of autumn Hanoi. Together, all of elements harmonized in a “surreal” atmosphere, subtly sophisticated at Rue Du Camp. Each decoration evokes Vietnamese features that are both strange and familiar in contemporary inspiration.
cuisines: Pizza with Private Dining in Hanoi
Seafood Restaurants for Large Groups in Hanoi
example_reviews: We visited Rue Du Camp cafe/bistro early on a Saturday evening. We went up to the 1st level seating area. Waitress was attentive and friendly. We ordered a battered prawn appetiser followed by Szechuan beef and Teriyaki beef. Both were nicely presented on a large platter with smaller dishes - one vegetable broth, one salad and the main plate with rice and beef. The broth was very lightly flavoured and not very hot (in keeping with all establishments we've used in Hanoi - lukewarm broth seems to be the way of things here!). The salad was fresh and tasty, the beef and rice were delicious. We had a beer and a Rosebud tea. The tea was presented in a glass teapot on a glass burner/tealight stand. The rose buds slowly infused and opened to release their flavour. It was lovely. All in all we spent VND560,000/GBP20/USD24 + tip as no service charge was included. Excellent value for money.

As we were walking from the Temple of Literature to the Opera House along Trang Thi we noticed this restaurant's beautiful interior wood work and decided to check it out. Returned later for supper and the food was fantastic. Had meet some people in Siagon who were also in Hanoi and invited them to join us for supper a few nights later and the restaurant did not disappoint us again. On the North East corner of Trang Thi and Hoi Vu, it is not difficult to find and well worth it. The cost of the meals was also very reasonable.

First time here as introduced by friends. nice location, close to everything in town. u should note that bearing 50 of trang thi str., but there're a few 50s there and this shop is actually at the joint with Hoi Vu. nice settings out and inside, mix of east and west, lot of sunshines and greens the shop now has lotus theme for drinks and foods. I tried the lotus cofee a mixture of vietnamese cofee with minced and sweet lotus. interesting. we ordered lotus trunk salad, beefsteak and lotus roasted pigeon vemicelli soup. foods was so so 3 over 5 scale

name: Vamos - Tapas Kitchen & Bar
address: 19A đường Tây Hồ, Hanoi Vietnam
description: Inspired by Spanish cuisine and culture, Vamos Tapas Kitchen and Bar was born to blow a new breath into the Hanoi culinary map. Vamos offers the most authentic experience of Tapas culture - the essence of Spanish cuisine. The combination of Asian and European cuisine in the OPEN KITCHEN SPACE and Mediterranean atmosphere will be fully displayed at Vamos Tapas Kitchen & Bar (No. 19A, Tay Ho st, Tay Ho dist, Ha Noi, Vietnam)
cuisines: South American Restaurants for Lunch in Hanoi
example_reviews: The restaurant's space is extremely cozy, friendly with a bit of Spanish, Latin, and Mediterranean style, looks very pleasant, I haven’t found any tapas restaurant similar with this style in Hanoi. If I had to choose, I would choose to sit outside near the open kitchen bar. Foods is Spanish Fusion, I ordered some dishes, all is truly impressive, excepted sweet potation chips, it is a bit hard, pale and oily About drink, you guys if come here must try cocktail named Frambuesa, it has light pink color, so good and looks beautiful too. Ah, that night I also ordered one shot tequila named “clase azul resposado” just because of curious, really it’s most expensive tequila i have known 🫣 😰, it costs equal one my dinner 😱 but it’s worth

Had a great dining experience in Vamos!! Especially the chic atmosphere in the restaurant, friendly staffs, wide selection of food and drinks and the decoration of the restaurant is so perfect for photos on insta🤭. I personally love the roasted suckling pig a lot which is always my favourite Spanish dish. Definitely will go again !!

At the end of a tour of Vietnam from south to north. I wanted something other than the beautiful Vietnamese food that we had been eating. I was told how extraordinary this place was in Hanoi. I was not disappointed, we started with a few tapas dishes and then had the Spanish Seafood Paella, finishing off with the cheesecake. The authenticity of the food is amazing, I am aware they source a lot of their product from Spain, so it’s no wonder it’s authentic. Has the opportunity of meeting Mr Tam and Miss Thuy. What beautiful people. Please support this restaurant, I am not easy to please, but I thought it transported me back to Spain or South America.

name: The Australian Bistro and Coffee
address: 126 Yen Lang Thinh Quang, Dong Da, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
description: The OB located in the heart of Hanoi which is run by an Australian chef. We offer all high-standard food and services at a reasonable price so that everyone can come to enjoy the romantic, cozy atmosphere. Besides, all freshest ingredients are bought from reliable suppliers and imported directly from Australia.
cuisines: Pizza for Large Groups in Hanoi
Late Night Seafood Restaurants in Hanoi
example_reviews: I highly recommend The Outback Australian Bistro and Coffee, I went there for diner with my friend, staff is very friendly, gave us good advises on foods and drinks. And the food was awesome ! Pizza and Spaggetti were so delicious and i cannot describe how good it was . I will come back for sure !!

My husband and I accidentally had dinner at this restaurant. However we were so supprised and thought it was worth every single penny. The price was so cheap and delicious that we def will comeback soon. My steak was so tender and creamy sauce was so yummy. My husband had chicken roulade with mashed potato also nice and juicy. Staff were soooo friendly and hospitable. We def will comeback The Outback.

Had dinner here with a group of friends and we all had a good experience. Food was really good and service was exceptional. Our server, Chu Bá Thông, was very attentive and friendly. Would definitely come back again with friends.

name: El Gaucho | Ba Dinh
address: Unit L1-16A, Vincom Center Metropolis, 29 Lieu Giai Ngoc Khanh Ward, Ba Dinh District, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
description: Food is our passion and it is our aim to establish the benchmark in Southeast Asia and beyond for a contemporary, specialised steakhouse concept. We are proud to serve you the finest steakhouse-style food, using only the best available meat products sourced from selected farms in Victoria, New South Wales and individual farmers and ranchers in the United States.
cuisines: Thai Restaurants with Private Dining in Hanoi
Vietnamese Restaurants for Lunch in Hanoi
American Restaurants with Private Dining in Hanoi
example_reviews: Had been to El Gaucho in Trang Tien previously and found the lunch set to be good value. Same could be said here at Vincom in Ba Dinh. Had the salsicha this time as the starter. The spicy sausage was a good complement to the mixed green salad and proved a good appetizer for the main course. I had the rib eye and it was cooked to the medium I asked. Nicely seasoned and juicy. The steak fries were too big for my liking and perhaps normal cut fries would be a better pairing for the steak. In any case, good value for lunch. Expensive, certainly. Service was prompt and I had no complaints.

Ate a good steak served with excellence by the young staff there. No complaints. I DO however have a bone to pick with El Gaucho itself: They make things up that don’t exist. There is NO SUCH THING AS “Platinum USDA Prime”. It is quite simply NOT a thing. It does not exist. Which leads me to ask: What are we really getting? Is the “USDA Prime” not really prime? But something lower? Is the “Platinum USDA Prime” (which again, Google it, DOES NOT EXIST except in the fertile minds of El Gaucho marketing staff) actually exactly the same thing as the USDA Prime on the menu? Just an idiot trap? If you Google “Platinum USDA Prime” you will find only references to El Gaucho. They fabricated it out of whole cloth. This “grade” of meat does not exist anywhere else. There is no explanation anywhere about what it is. It is BS. El Gaucho serves BS along with their bull meat. So something is dishonest about El Gaucho. Either the USDA Prime is not “prime” but “Choice” or lower, or if you are dump enough to pay a premium for “Platinum USDA Prime” you will probably get the same steak you would have gotten if you had ordered the USDA Prime for MUCH LESS MONEY. I would love El Gaucho Management to explain themselves. I hesitate to return, due to the corporate dishonesty. Again, my meal was fine (I had a USDA Prime Ribeye, 300 grams, because I wasn’t about to order a side of BS with my steak) and the service was excellent. I just don’t think they are selling what it says on the tin. False advertising. “Platinum USDA Prime” is NOT A THING.

From the moment we walked in, my family and I were greeted by the friendly staff. We ordered off the cheesburgers off the lunch menu. The food tasted amazing and for incredible value. תודה לך ושיאיר פני אלוהים עליך ועל ישראל

name: Banh Mi 14
address: 14 Ngo Huyen Hoan Kiem, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
description: Our Banh Mi store is very small but very good, clean and cheap! I can make one Banh Mi in about 5 minutes, you can take away very easy! Come and check it out guys!
cuisines: Vietnamese Restaurants for Lunch in Hanoi
American Restaurants with Private Dining in Hanoi
example_reviews: We ate here twice, once on an amazing food tour (shout out to Vietnam is Awesome) and once on our own. We tried several different sandwiches and they were all amazing. Highly recommend!
It is interesting how is not famous on Tripadvisor. I think it´s the best shop of Banh mi. We went there a couple of times. The prices, the food, the place. AWESOME!
The baguettes, as well as the yoghurt meals, are superb and cheap. The owner is really friendly and quick.

name: Bo De Quan Vegetarian Restaurant
address: 164 Au Co Street, Tay Ho District, Hanoi 10000 Vietnam
description: this is a vegan/vegetarian restaurant with a wide variety of dishes served buffet style.  We went with a guide as part of a larger evening tour and he explained all of the food to us.  Without a guide you may be guessing what each dish actually is, but it all tastes good.  No worries about accidently eating meat.  There are a lot of Mock Meats (which are important for cultural reasons).  Definitely a place to come if you are vegan.
cuisines: Thai Restaurants with Private Dining in Hanoi
Vietnamese Restaurants for Lunch in Hanoi
American Restaurants with Private Dining in Hanoi
example_reviews: this is a vegan/vegetarian restaurant with a wide variety of dishes served buffet style. We went with a guide as part of a larger evening tour and he explained all of the food to us. Without a guide you may be guessing what each dish actually is, but it all tastes good. No worries about accidently eating meat. There are a lot of Mock Meats (which are important for cultural reasons). Definitely a place to come if you are vegan.
Good Experience with the Guide. Near by area Buddhist monuments that contains number of text, Images of Buddha Bodhi satva

I came here, because of the holidays, other place i looked for was closed. How happy i am that i did. Variety of veggie dishes, everything is fresh, You can eat as much as You want. Soups are amazing. You have also fresh fruits, salads, fried options.

name: Tu Lun Beef Noodle
address: 23 Hai Ba Trung, Hanoi 10000 Vietnam
description: the Beef Pho was really nice, the broth obviously had a lot of time and effort put into it and it really showed. nice hand done noodles
example_reviews: the Beef Pho was really nice, the broth obviously had a lot of time and effort put into it and it really showed. nice hand done noodles

One of the best Pho that i've had in Vietnam so far. However this place is small with rather little seats and you will likely need to share table with others. Not the cleanest eatery but really really good Pho.
Simple, but great taste. Cant say anything more. Just try it! Every incredient you can order more if its not enough.

name: Thien Tra Dao
address: 29 Alley 26 Vo Van Dung Dong Da, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
description: Thien Tra Dao serves artisan tea and vegan food in a peaceful place with two floors and zen music played in the background. Located in a quiet alley. Menu is in Vietnamese and English. Has English speaking staff. Est. 2017. Open Mon-Sun 9.am to 10.pm
example_reviews: My fave place to have healthy vegan food. I came here many times before, usually had bun cha or the fresh rolls, now they have less food options but I don’t mind cuz my fave dishes are still there. Will definitely come back to try more tea (there are a lot!). P/s: they persuaded me to try the Pad thai because the weather was cold. Worth it! Hot and spicy and the portion is big!

In a peaceful neighborhood with delicious food!! This is a hidden gem. The Cinnamon Orange tea (I got it hot) was amazing!!! Best tea I have had by far. The sticky rice was delicious as well and the salad hoa qua nhiet doi was perfect!! A must visit place- even if your not vegan 😊 Follow @travelingypsey on Instagram & Google Maps Safe Travels!
Very creative dishes and arrangements. Its nice to find a restaurant in hanoi that is clean & takes pride. The staff is warm and mindful as well. Will def be ordering again. Thank you!

name: Sushi Bar II
address: 51 Xuan Dieu, Tay Ho, Hanoi 10000 Vietnam
description: Awesome sushi, and we ordered way more than we could eat.  It's mostly made fresh for you, and we got a few extras like miso soup and a starter thrown in for free.  Excellent service and great food.  We live nearby and will be back.
cuisines: German Restaurants for Lunch in Hanoi
example_reviews: Awesome sushi, and we ordered way more than we could eat. It's mostly made fresh for you, and we got a few extras like miso soup and a starter thrown in for free. Excellent service and great food. We live nearby and will be back.

We were a group of five who booked a table last min on Sat night that they managed to fit us in. The menu is a little overwhelming as there is so much choice. We opted for a selection of sushi, tempura dishes with edamane beans. All was super tasty and fresh, perfect sharing as a group with a few tiger beers on tap. Bill worked out less than £10 each for decent amount of food and a couple of drinks each.

After three times at this place I can recommend without any doubt, Service is fast, if you are a sushi fan everything is prepared fresh open to the guest. I had several non sushi dishes , always hot And fresh. So if you do shopping in the mall and want to eat something fresh and healthy it is better than fat fastfood you get around.

name: Parosand Sky Bar Restaurant
address: 9th Floor, 537 Lac Long Quan Xuan La, Tay Ho, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
description: Pilot Restaurant is located on the 9th floor that offers both Vietnamese and Western food. It is a perfect place to catch up with friends and family and enjoy fusion cuisine as well as wide selection of wine.
example_reviews: Overall we were impressed with the restaurant and sky bar. The food was of good quality, comparable to some other popular Western cuisine restaurants in the Old Quarter. There were a variety of drinks and they were delicious too. However, we were generally disappointed with the music, as it was a little too loud and the playlist seems to have had only pop songs. There weren't any classical songs or house ones, which are what we expect on the sky bar. If you don't mind chilling in mediocre music then this place should probably be on your to-go list. Oh, and we must also mention that the view here is spectacular. You'll love it.
Sensational place to have breakfast. Value for money sensational and the staff can not do enough for you

name: Local Bar
address: 16 Ta Hien Street Hoan Kiem, Hanoi 10000 Vietnam
description: Great bar on the Old Quarter's busiest street where regulars and new friends come together for great drinks and cool music to party the night away.
cuisines: Eastern European Restaurants for Lunch in Hanoi
example_reviews: Small place. It was a good experience. Cheap drinks. Lucky to have 2 rounds of Sheesha served in happy hours. Happy Us !! Happy High !!

I love my visit. The staff are eztremely friendly. They speak a little english but that’s okay, all you need are the basics. The people are crazy fun but you will be left alone if you wish to. It’s a fun and safe place to hang out. The crowd maybe wild most of the time but it is a decent place and you’ll feel secure. The sounds ^high five^ took me back to the 90s disco and lead me to present. Plus, you’ll feel at home. The staff will even walk you to your ride (when you go there alone). Thank you guys!!! Will surely comeback. Can’t wait
I have been there at the midnight , music so nice , i can dancing with my friends, and drink not so expensive !

name: Pizza 4P's Lotte West Lake Hanoi
address: 272 Vo Chi Cong street., Hanoi 11210 Vietnam
description: Visited here twice over 3 days. The second time (Monday) the staff were excellent. The food was served quickly and was delicious. The only downsides: Vietnamese need to respect eating environments - 2 fellow diners were coughing and constantly clearing their throats; they had finished eating and were just lounging about. No-one can be seated next to them and be expected to enjoy a meal.
example_reviews: Visited here twice over 3 days. The second time (Monday) the staff were excellent. The food was served quickly and was delicious. The only downsides: Vietnamese need to respect eating environments - 2 fellow diners were coughing and constantly clearing their throats; they had finished eating and were just lounging about. No-one can be seated next to them and be expected to enjoy a meal.

My wife and I ate here twice whilst in Hanoi. Each time we had to queue and now I know why. The chicken teriyaki pizza and crab pasta are fabulous, so it you fancy an Italian, then please.have a look here.
A fun place to eat, lots of energy, friendly and accommodating staff and the food was great too. I would definitely return

name: Cho Que Restaurant
address: Số 1, Ngõ 163 Hoàng Ngân, Cầu Giấy, Hanoi 10000 Vietnam
description: We sampled a variety of Hanoi food. We loved the snail soup with brinjal, the grilled fish, the grilled chicken kebab. Plenty to eat till we were stuffed. The service was just okay, the food was great though.
example_reviews: We sampled a variety of Hanoi food. We loved the snail soup with brinjal, the grilled fish, the grilled chicken kebab. Plenty to eat till we were stuffed. The service was just okay, the food was great though.
This restaurant serve many traditional Vietnamese dishes. The food is very good. Nice staffs. The atmosphere is like a rural village in Vietnam.

Well, recently, my company held a year-end party in this restaurant. It's a little bit difficult to find this place but when you arrive, it won't make you disppointed with nicly and warmly decorated atmosphere like you are in countryside. I recommend you to try beef grilled in bamboo. It's delicious. Also, a quite simple dish is a fried sweet potato. The dessert is decorated well.

name: Hai San Lau Cua
address: 1 Ly Thai To, Hanoi Vietnam
description:
Yes, it was expensive if you compare with other streetfood restaurant in average.
The price is a little higher as they served seafood. I paid 1 mio VND for 2 persons.
Be sure, that you ask for a price before ordering, as the price is per kg and it depends on market.
example_reviews: Yes, it was expensive if you compare with other streetfood restaurant in average. The price is a little higher as they served seafood. I paid 1 mio VND for 2 persons. Be sure, that you ask for a price before ordering, as the price is per kg and it depends on market.
Nice food and nice staffs But it is rather expensive Price of crab depends on market price and kg Bring cash with you since they do not accept card

If you want to eat fresh seafood,you can choose there ,By the way the price already higher than other Asia country. And remember to ask them cook by salty or steam. Not bad service but also not friendly,and it’s ensure different price between foreigner and local,popular food is crab hotpot.

name: Truc Lam Quan
address: Alley 4, Than Nhan Trung Phu Linh, Soc Son, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam

name: Chops Lotte
address: 56 Pham Huy Thong, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
description: This is the 3rd Chops to open in Hanoi and is situated on Pham Huy Thong. With great views looking straight over Ngoc Khanh Lake. Serving gourmet burgers, tempting starters and salads coupled with a fine selection of craft beers on draught and bottles. Great atmosphere with a non stop playlist of classic rock. The restaurant is over 3 floors and has an outside seating area on the top floor overlooking the lake.
cuisines: Late Night American Restaurants in Hanoi
Asian Restaurants for Large Groups in Hanoi
BBQ Restaurants for Lunch in Hanoi
example_reviews: Absolutely superb burgers here including vegetarian, smoothies and juices also available as well as a gorgeous bar with interesting pale ales. Very cheap for what you are getting too.
I have been living in Hanoi for 4 years and haven't found better place with burgers. The location near the lake is great and staff is super nice.
Perfect burgers, amazing place, would 100% recommend!!!! Really great meat and atmosphere. Thesauces were very nice too

name: Cutisun Restaurant
address: No. 3, Alley 120, Hoang Hoa Tham Street, Hanoi 10000 Vietnam
description: I ate at a different restaurant of the same chain but I think they would be similar in quality. The foods were not special but the main plus is their affordable price
cuisines: Late Night BBQ Restaurants in Hanoi
example_reviews: I ate at a different restaurant of the same chain but I think they would be similar in quality. The foods were not special but the main plus is their affordable price

Cute little diner. Attractive decor. Low prices for steak. I had the rib eye and, yeh was ok but nothing to write home about. The sauce though was shocking and the chips and salad portions so small you could have put it on your fork in one go. I think this is a complaint others have highlighted in TA. The staff were strange, insisting we sit in the corner as there was not enough of us to fill a big table. We were the only customers for the entire time we were there so I don't know what that was about. My girlfriend had the lamb and it was considerably better than the steak.

Visited here after a 2 year gap. The waitress could not understand the simple menu presented in English - ‘French Fries’ was looked at in amazement. The glass of red wine was dirty. We had to remind them about the coke we had ordered. The food was simply plonked on the table as the waitress and her male colleague woofed down bread rolls within clear sight of customers.

name: Xôi Bà Hiền
address: 25 Ngõ 622 Minh Khai, Vĩnh Tuy, Hai Bà Trưng, Hà Nội, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
description: Xôi thịt nóng ăn sáng, ăn trưa thời gian 06:00 - 14:00 hàng ngày. Xôi rằm, mùng 1. Xôi lễ, xôi tiệc. 25 ngõ 622 Minh Khai.
cuisines: French Restaurants for Large Groups in Hanoi
German Restaurants for Lunch in Hanoi
example_reviews: I went there almost every morning during my 3-week trip for breakfast. Chewy stick rice with various toppings to combine. Best stewed pork belly I ever have.

If you’re looking for the ultimate Vietnamese experience, this sticky rice is a true standout. The sticky rice is delightfully chewy and aromatic, paired with tender, well-seasoned meat that melts in your mouth!

name: Bún chả Sinh Từ
address: 100 Hai Bà Trưng, Cửa Nam, Hoàn Kiếm, Hai Ba Trung, Hanoi Vietnam
description: Before, I ate shrimp cakes and vermicelli noodles that were very delicious... this time I had a chance to go out with my family and saw that the restaurant had a location here so I went in to eat... the food was prepared very quickly, the dipping sauce was brought out to the guests, the meat was still hot. ,,, I ordered a roasted bird, it was well marinated, the meat was not dry... especially I really like the raw vegetables served here, which are abundant, clean, and look very delicious... I rate the quality very well. The quality here compares to other bun cha restaurants I've eaten at
cuisines: Healthy Restaurants in Hai Ba Trung
Vietnamese Restaurants for Lunch in Hai Ba Trung
example_reviews: Before, I ate shrimp cakes and vermicelli noodles that were very delicious... this time I had a chance to go out with my family and saw that the restaurant had a location here so I went in to eat... the food was prepared very quickly, the dipping sauce was brought out to the guests, the meat was still hot. ,,, I ordered a roasted bird, it was well marinated, the meat was not dry... especially I really like the raw vegetables served here, which are abundant, clean, and look very delicious... I rate the quality very well. The quality here compares to other bun cha restaurants I've eaten at
Spacious and airy space, good and thoughtful service, delicious and clean food, convenient parking ❤️❤️❤️
Today I stopped by 100 Hai Ba Trung and had lunch. The food here is very delicious and the restaurant is very clean. The staff is also quick and very enthusiastic.

name: Quan Bia Minh
address: 7A Dinh Liet, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
description: Just 2 minutes walk from the north end of Hoan Kiem lake at the lake end of Dinh Liet St
example_reviews: I ate here on my last night in Hanoi. I was on my own so sat upstairs on the balcony overlooking the busy street below. I ordered a beer and started with the pork spring rolls, which were really delicious. I ate a lot of spring rolls in Vietnam and these ones were up there with the best. For main meal I ordered a beef dish with chilli and lemongrass and was disappointed. I was served a huge plate of onion, with beef and carrot scattered throughout. Unfortunately I’m not a fan of onion, so I found myself picking around it. The flavour was a bit bland also. Had I just had beer and spring rolls, it would have been much better.

Hot day and really just stopped by for a local Bia Hoi. Sat on the terrace and people watched, which is something even novice people watchers like me can get into. The rhythms of this city are strangely recognizable under the superficial appearance of randomness. Service a bit slow … and it was not busy. But, good local beer and viewing of life.
Many choices in the menu, nice local upstairs and delicious pho. The only problem was that our dishes arrived with 15 minutes difference...

name: Manwah Taiwanese Hotpot Thai Ha
address: 1 Thai Ha 2nd Floor, Dong Da, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
description:
If you are familiar with haidilao, then you may imagine this chain as an attempt to copy it.  Which is fine, if it is done well.  Unfortunately it falls short of the following issues:
(1). Soup base.  The Taiwanese special soup was good, but there were too many lotus seeds inside.  The tomato soup, my favourite for hotpot, was average.  
(2). Meats.  This is the first steamboat restaurant I have ever been to, that does not have chicken in the menu.  The waiter said there is duck, but he himself cannot find it in the menu.  He then served us a plate of duck… (?!).  However, fried chicken is offered in the buffet.  Since I’m on missing items, this is also the first steamboat restaurant I have ever been to, that does not have plain steamed rice in the menu.  Yup, NO RICE but noodles.
(3). Desserts.  Although there is a large variety, some items tasted “funny” eg the black glutinous rice, the red ruby.  The “raindrop” was amazing, though it tasted rather bland.
(4). Service.  There are minor attempts to provide a high level of service eg. One waiter came to help us peel the prawns - unfortunately, he came only after we were done with two of four prawns.  No one came to remove the foam from the soups.  Soup refilling needed to be asked for.  Soup ladles were not sufficient.  I note that the condiments were not regularly refilled either.

Our first and last visit,
cuisines: BBQ Restaurants for Large Groups in Hanoi

This is the best hotpot in Hanoi with excellent services from restaurant manager and their staff. Truly 5 Star rating

A broad range of options, for all budgets. The most important in hotpot is the control of the temperature and you are provided with an effective tool to modify it depending on the food you put inside (e.g. octopus, red meat, meatballs, etc.). The deserts are average. The tables at the periphery are right next to the shopping mall pathway so not recommended as they are noisy. Better choose inside tables. Need to book in advance as it is popular.

name: Tomato Seafood
address: 82 Le Van Huu Street, Hai Ba Trung District, Hanoi Vietnam
description: Fresh seafood everyday, in a clean and modern restaurant with reasonable price and friendly staffs. This seafood restaurant brand has 2 locations in town: 82 Le Van Huu, Hoan Kiem & 33 Nguyen Thi Dinh, Cau Giay.
example_reviews: New place for who want to try seafood combo. 765.000 vnd for 2 pax. Included : baked oyster. Sauteed vegetable. Fried bebe. Crab hot pot. Service is ok. Nothing special when leaving here.
I am Vietnamese. I find seafood here, when the taste is quite good. However, sometimes you have to wait for many guests

name: The East Tonkin
address: 11-13 Hàng Mắm, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
description: The East Tonkin Restaurant represents the elegant lotus nestled in the hustle and bustle of Hanoi's Ancient Quarter. We celebrate the uniqueness of the Red River delta by honouring our local ingredients and seasonal specialities.
cuisines: Mediterranean Restaurants for Lunch in Hanoi
Mexican Restaurants for Lunch in Hanoi
Middle Eastern Restaurants with Buffet in Hanoi
example_reviews: The food was fresh and staff were attentive! I particularly enjoyed the Bun Cha! Our family left full and happy. We would recommend :)

name: The East Tonkin
address: 11-13 Hàng Mắm, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
description: The East Tonkin Restaurant represents the elegant lotus nestled in the hustle and bustle of Hanoi's Ancient Quarter. We celebrate the uniqueness of the Red River delta by honouring our local ingredients and seasonal specialities.
cuisines: Mediterranean Restaurants for Lunch in Hanoi
Mexican Restaurants for Lunch in Hanoi
Middle Eastern Restaurants with Buffet in Hanoi
example_reviews: The food was fresh and staff were attentive! I particularly enjoyed the Bun Cha! Our family left full and happy. We would recommend :)

name: Legend Beer Brew House
address: 04 Vu Ngoc Phan, Hanoi 10000 Vietnam
description: Originally was going for the fish fry, but changed my mind and got German food.  Great atmosphere, friendly attentive servers, food was presented in large quantities. Some dishes were good, but others not so good. Excellent scenic view.
cuisines: Pizza with Private Dining in Hanoi
Seafood Restaurants for Large Groups in Hanoi
example_reviews: Originally was going for the fish fry, but changed my mind and got German food. Great atmosphere, friendly attentive servers, food was presented in large quantities. Some dishes were good, but others not so good. Excellent scenic view.
This was a good place to have a beer or two, with western style food, while watching the world go by on the round-a-about from the 4th floor. All very clean and reasonably priced.

And we did manage to get one of the edge tables that give a great view over Hoan Kiem Lake. But personally the reason I really liked it was that it did two draft house beers and one of these was a really good dark beer. We found it a very good elevated spot to take a break from walking the lake and rest with a decent beer for a while. Oh and the Free Wi-Fi worked well as well..

name: Maazi Lotte Westlake
address: 683 Đ. Lạc Long Quân, Phú Thượng, Tây Hồ, Tay Ho, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
description: Now when I go alone, I order Butter Chicken. One person's portion is enough to eat enough for two people, so if you're on a diet, remember to tell the chef to add some butter & rice!! 10 points of unique Indian flavor, rice grains are very loose & delicious. Will come back thanks
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Tay Ho
Street Food Restaurants in Tay Ho
Cafes for Breakfast in Tay Ho
American Restaurants for Lunch in Tay Ho
example_reviews: Now when I go alone, I order Butter Chicken. One person's portion is enough to eat enough for two people, so if you're on a diet, remember to tell the chef to add some butter & rice!! 10 points of unique Indian flavor, rice grains are very loose & delicious. Will come back thanks

- delicious food, chicken curry sauce is quite suitable, rich and creamy. Long grain rice is sticky and fragrant. Eat with roll sauce - You order Khanh something lovely + friendly staff - The minus point is that the food I ordered was quite spicy and had a lot of flour, so I got bored eating it quickly. Few green vegetables because I'm used to eating green vegetables in Vietnam.

Yummy curry! We had Paneer tikka masala and Daal Makhni. We also had buttered Naan, garlic butter naan and Mango Lassi. It was all yummy. We enjoyed our meal and will come again. Khanh was very helpful with our order.

name: Cincin Hà Nội
address: 80 Hang Trong, Hanoi Vietnam
description: Found this little gem by chance on a hot Friday afternoon looking to escape the heat for a cool wine and snack. Greeted by a young fresh exuberant team who went out of their way to look after us for what ended up being a couple of hours of relaxation, soft background music, great wines and fantastic cheese platter and pate which is no mean fete given the location.  The small restaurant is brilliantly decorated but what made it extra special was to watch a team of four young, polite, attentive and jovial staff who clearly enjoy their work and love being with and attending to customers.  What a refreshing and positive experience to see positive enthusiastic young people at work.  Definitely on our visit again list and highly recommended.
example_reviews: Found this little gem by chance on a hot Friday afternoon looking to escape the heat for a cool wine and snack. Greeted by a young fresh exuberant team who went out of their way to look after us for what ended up being a couple of hours of relaxation, soft background music, great wines and fantastic cheese platter and pate which is no mean fete given the location. The small restaurant is brilliantly decorated but what made it extra special was to watch a team of four young, polite, attentive and jovial staff who clearly enjoy their work and love being with and attending to customers. What a refreshing and positive experience to see positive enthusiastic young people at work. Definitely on our visit again list and highly recommended.

Cincin was an unexpected delight to encounter. Great food and drinks in a modern contemporary setting. The staff were attentive and the ambience was lovely. We were able to take a break from the hustle and bustle of Hanoi to enjoy a small bite to eat. I chose the chilli and garlic prawns, truffle chips and the profiterole's. I also had the oolong milk tea. All was delicious! I would recommend this place to all.

name: Swing Lounge
address: 21 Trang Tien, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
description: Swing Cafe & Restaurant offer you a classic but trendy atmosphere right in the heart of Hanoi. It's a great place to meet your business partners, hang out with your friends, or simply finish your ongoing novel with a cup of tea by the window overlooking the crowded Hanoi street. We offer various Vietnamese and Italian cuisines, as well as a large selection of teas, coffee, juices and delicious desert cakes. Swing Music Lounge opens every evening and it's truly a place where you can enjoy LIVE singers perform the best Vietnamese and English songs every nights. A dazzling perform stage, a romantic candle lit table, a delicious signature cocktails, a glass of the finest wine, or just simply a cold beer... we have it all!
cuisines: German Restaurants for Lunch in Hanoi
example_reviews: The restaurant first floor ambiance is interesting and the food is good. We went on a Saturday night before the show and it was extremely quiet, almost empty. Around 21:00 we then went up to the second floor where is the stage and it felt suddenly more crowded. I might be wrong but it seems that the place is mostly frequented by a young Vietnamese middle class. The staff kindly gave us the possibility to get a table and it looked like everyone else had their seats reserved in advance. Before the band there was 2 lady singers performing each 3 recorded songs as a warm up. The rock band was very talented, the atmosphere very cool but the sound was so loud that eventually we needed to cover our ears most of the time. After an hour we decided to leave before bursting our eardrums... Maybe it is not always loud like that but if that's the case then it is a bit of a shame as it makes it really hard to appreciate what is being played. Drinks are a bit pricy but you don't pay any entrance fee so it balance up the value. A cool place to hang out and if I may suggest bring some ear plugs just in case...

Really cool ambiance here, it seems like a popular music (live band) venue over the restaurant, the food was really delicious but getting the order and getting a waiter after was so hard just to get some pepper and salt. Thankfully one of them speak English the price was quite decent, spent 480000 for 3 people (3 meals and 1 fresh juice and 2 teas) I recommend this place if you have time and patience it's worth it.

We have really enjoyed the quality food, actually snacks, some finger foods, and softdrinks. Seem that evything went smooth but it just overall, this place a bit lack of smiles. From the satff. Great if the manager could look into this issue.

name: Let's Sushi
address: 13B Quoc Tu Giam Van Chuong, Hanoi 100000 Vietnam
description: The sashimi is fresh and soft. It melts long in my mouth. The sushi is flavorful and chewy. The Japanese beef is tenderly soft and with the sauce, it explodes a good taste in my mouth. For dessert, I have the mochi ice-cream. Overall, this deserves to be 100/10.
cuisines: German Restaurants for Lunch in Hanoi
example_reviews: The sashimi is fresh and soft. It melts long in my mouth. The sushi is flavorful and chewy. The Japanese beef is tenderly soft and with the sauce, it explodes a good taste in my mouth. For dessert, I have the mochi ice-cream. Overall, this deserves to be 100/10.
It was really good sushi. Good service too. The toilet is a bit dirty but this seems to be quite normal in Hanoi. If you are around pop in and enjoy. Yummy Sushi. And fresh.
Very decent sushi which was enjoyed by all. Close to train station which was useful for us. Kids enjoyed the gyoza and prawn tempura.

name: Hạ - Cơm Nấu Lối Huế
address: 01 Nguyễn Sinh Cung Phường Vỹ Dạ, Quận Thuận Hoá, Hue 49000 Vietnam
description: This restaurant opened only 3 months ago and is very good positioned near the river. Classy experience and very good kitchen. The service lacks experience but this will get better with time.  Overall a very good experience.
cuisines: Sushi Restaurants for Lunch in Hue
example_reviews: This restaurant opened only 3 months ago and is very good positioned near the river. Classy experience and very good kitchen. The service lacks experience but this will get better with time. Overall a very good experience.

Gorgeous spot a few steps away from the main city. Really modern restaurant situated on a small island over a bridge. Stunning space, delicious food, great service. Phuong Trinh was very helpful recommending some great dishes.

name: Vị Huế Restaurant & Café
address: 61 Võ Thị Sáu, Phú Hội, Hue Vietnam
description: Renowned for its vibrant flavors, fresh ingredients, and artistic presentation, Huế cuisine is a treasure of Vietnam’s culinary heritage. Vị Huế takes this tradition to new heights, blending sustainability and creativity into every dish. From fragrant herbs to delicate spices, every bite reflects the royal essence of Hue, inviting diners on an unforgettable journey of flavors, culture, and refinement!
cuisines: Sushi Restaurants for Lunch in Hue
Thai Restaurants for Lunch in Hue
example_reviews: Exquisite experience from start to finish. Mong, our waitress, had the warmest smile and made us feel at home. The food was amazing, each dish surprised us with a different, subtle taste. We had the lotus salad, duck, linguine, rice noodles as well as the flambéed banana and sweet soup for dessert. The interior design was gorgeous. This restaurant was Perfection in all aspects. We paid 22 dollars per person (without wine) for what felt like a Michelin meal.

If you’re looking for a cozy restaurant with excellent service, Vi Hue is a must-visit. The service is prompt and attentive without being intrusive. The ambiance is charming, with soft lighting and a relaxed vibe that makes you feel at home. The menu offers a wide range of dishes, and each plate is a masterpiece in flavor and presentation. I highly recommend their signature Sous vide duck breast, which is perfectly cooked and rich in taste. And I’m really impressive with good service of Mrs.Dream and Mrs.Vi.

Very elegant restaurant and inventive cuisine. The dishes I chose were delicious and very well presented. Vietnamese cuisine of high standard for relatively wise prices. The staff , multilingual is very welcoming and with little care especially Mr.Bach who was very attentive and took care to explain each dish in French! The decor is successful and relaxing. Do not forget to have a cocktail 🍸🍹 they are well made and original. I will definitely return during my stay. Patrick

name: Bánh Gánh Restaurant
address: 51 Võ Thị Sáu, Hue 49118 Vietnam
description: Local food- Hue specialites
example_reviews: This is a great little restaurant just outside the main hub the serves delicious food and good service for a reasonable price. I have been searching Hue for my favourite spicy Hue style noodle soup and on our last day we found it at this restaurant. We have found that most of the restaurants in Vietnam don’t serve spicy and you have to ask. If you don’t like spicy then most of the menu is just great tasting Vietnamese food. Worth a visit when in Hue.

We visited for dinner and sat on the second floor so we could people watch from the large windows upstairs. The food was delicious and so well priced. Our waiter was friendly and suggested reducing our order as he felt we wouldn’t be able to eat it all…and he was right! We ordered the local speciality beef soup to share and a main course each with rice , plus a beer and glass of wine and spent around £16 in total which was great! There were loads of prawns in my stir fry prawns and vegetable stir fry and the pak choi, okra, carrots and cabbage were very tasty in a light spicy sauce.

Absolutely delightful restaurant serving local specialties (that the wait staff are happy to advise you on!). Sat upstairs overlooking the street. Comfortable and not at all noisy. (this was a real plus given the commotion on the walking streets on a Sunday evening). The menu had delectable vegetarian choices for the friends we were traveling with who had been relegated to rice and steamed vegetables for several days. The food was modestly priced and outstanding (I took their advice on the local specialties, my husband had a clay pot meal- all the dishes were terrific). We REALLY enjoyed chatting with the wait staff, especially Bom who was eager to speak English with us. They were attentive and helpful. Easy to walk here from our hotel via the pedestrian "walking streets" from our hotel

name: Imperial Craft Bia Brewpub
address: 21/4 Ngo Gia Tu Vinh Ninh, Hue 530000 Vietnam
