We were looking for a restaurant with vegetarian options in Cat Ba, and the Ladybird delighted us. The relaxed atmosphere and attentive service allowed us to enjoy a delicious meal on the terrace. The flavors were authentic and refined.

Espresso, Capuchino, Latte, Americano or just Iced Milk Cafe, it was super good. Our group of 10 people really liked the iced milk coffee here, which is unique and special in Vietnam. At Ladybird, they chose coffee beans well so the quality is superior and well scented. Thank you Nhung for the warm and pleasant welcome. We recommend!!!

name: Casa Bonita
address: 82 Nui Ngoc, Hai Phong, Cat Ba 180000 Vietnam
description: With fresh ingredients from CatBa market turned into carefully selected recipes in our clean kitchen, Casa Bonita is guaranteed to delight your tastebuds!
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Cat Ba
Street Food Restaurants in Cat Ba
Romantic Seafood Restaurants in Cat Ba
example_reviews: We had a lovely meal a CASA bonita! We both ordered seafood curry after hearing good things and it did not disappoint! One of the best meals weâ€™ve had on our trip and the spice was jsut perfect! They also had happy hour on cocktails. We got two beers and two curryâ€™s and it was 8 British pound for all

Nice house, as the name suggests. Cozy restaurant with amazing dishes. We ordered the chicken, mango and avocado salad, carbon spaguettis with bacon and potato balls and cheese with sauce, it was all great. We were surprised by the quality and price. Definitely recommended.

I was in Cat Ba 3 nights and went to Casa Bonita for 2 of those nights (may have gone for all 3 nights if Iâ€™d discovered it the first day ðŸ˜‰). The food was great and very inexpensive. I had the seafood curry one night and cashew chicken the other - both were very good and were under 100,000 vnd. They also have a selection of baking that you can purchase (banana cake, carrot cake, apple pie, etc). I had the banana cake - it was really good, quite large and only cost 40,000 vnd. And, to top it all off, you may get to cuddle with some adorable kittens while youâ€™re there.

name: Bonne Vie Restaurant
address: 64 Dien Bien Phu Hong Bang, Hai Phong 180000 Vietnam
description: Bonne Vie Restaurant provides a diversity of F&B service, such as buffet, à la carte, lunch and dinner. The dishes are carefully crafted and delicately cooked in the style of European, Asian and Vietnamese cuisine. At the Manoir Des Arts hotel, our staff members significantly focus on building and implementing organizational culture in order to satisfy customers by providing the best value for customers during their stay.
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Hai Phong
Street Food Restaurants in Hai Phong
American Restaurants for Breakfast in Hai Phong
example_reviews: I used to go here three times with my sister. This restaurant is very famous for the Western dishes such as beefsteak, french fries, hamburgers and grilled foods. The entire atmosphere was filled with the smells of food. The taste of the food here was beyond my expectation. They were totally up to my standard! The most popular dish in this restaurant was beefsteak which was cooked perfectly with medium well level. What I was really satisfied with at this restaurant was the way the staff and waiters serve us there. especially the female restaurant waitress named Kim Chi. She was very friendly and made us feel that we were our home. Moreover, the relaxing music there really made our dishes taste more flavorful. I will definitely come back to this amazing restaurant more in the future.

The restaurant has brought me and my friends a wonderful dining experience. With Thao's subtle instructions on how to choose dishes, she helped us have a dinner that was just enough but still standard and European. Thank you very much for your service.

The food here was exquisite. It’s a bit expensive compared to Asian prices but not at all compared to European prices and the food is on a par with a a top European restaurant. I had foie gras which was divine and fish and chips and my husband had the steak. The way it was served was amazing with the chef coming to the table with the steak on a hot plate explaining the origin of it and setting Cointreau alight to make a sauce. All topped off with a delicious creme brûlée. The service was the best we have had anywhere with the staff so kind and attentive. We are so glad we ate here and will always remember it. . I highly recommend this restaurant if you are visiting Haiphong.

name: Yi Ling Ling Restaurant
address: Vinhomes Imperia Metropolitan Area, Ha Noi street, Hong Bang district, Hai Phong, Vietnam, Hai Phong 180000 Vietnam
description: A beautiful dining experience in an upmarket environment, with really pleasant staff.  Our waiter Quyền went out of his way to explain the dishes and the side dishes that would complement them.  Food was fresh tasty and authentic.  Certainly we will be returning for another visit soon
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Hai Phong
Street Food Restaurants in Hai Phong
French Restaurants for Lunch in Hai Phong
Japanese Restaurants with Private Dining in Hai Phong
example_reviews: A beautiful dining experience in an upmarket environment, with really pleasant staff. Our waiter Quyền went out of his way to explain the dishes and the side dishes that would complement them. Food was fresh tasty and authentic. Certainly we will be returning for another visit soon

- Delicious food, reasonable price - Luxurious, sparkling space, although not really Chinese style, there is music to compensate, gentle and relaxing - Serve quickly, thoughtfully, and pay attention to customer experience throughout the process of using the service - Chinese dishes typically have to be prepared meticulously and take time, so you should consult the menu and order before arriving. The menu consultant is very enthusiastic, paying attention to the taste limitations of diners. For example, can't eat spicy foods, are allergic to shrimp/fish,... - Dimsum and Ribs Yi Ling Ling is the best ❤️ - Not to mention the extremely diverse, delicious and beautiful drink menu ❤️

My family and I had the opportunity to visit Hai Phong, so friends suggested a restaurant for dinner. I quite like the space here, luxurious and sophisticated. Delicious food, suitable for taste and reasonable price. What really impressed me was the service style of the staff here. Especially that day, my family received Quyen's enthusiastic advice on the menu, help choosing dishes, and even dinner, he was always warm and friendly. I will definitely come back if I have the chance.

name: The Healing Kitchen
address: 229, Mot Thang Tu Street, Cat Ba Town, Hai Phong, Cat Ba 180000 Vietnam
description:
We had a great dining experience at The Healing Kitchen in Cat Ba. The salmon poke bowl was fresh and full of flavor, a perfect light and satisfying meal. Our server, Kiet, was attentive and friendly, making sure we had everything we needed.

We enjoyed it so much that we went back the next night for their espresso martinis, and Kiet made them perfectly. If youâ€™re looking for fresh, delicious food and great drinks in a welcoming atmosphere, this place is definitely worth a visit.
cuisines: Street Food Restaurants in Cat Ba
Fast Food Restaurants in Cat Ba
example_reviews: We had a great dining experience at The Healing Kitchen in Cat Ba. The salmon poke bowl was fresh and full of flavor, a perfect light and satisfying meal. Our server, Kiet, was attentive and friendly, making sure we had everything we needed. We enjoyed it so much that we went back the next night for their espresso martinis, and Kiet made them perfectly. If youâ€™re looking for fresh, delicious food and great drinks in a welcoming atmosphere, this place is definitely worth a visit.

I visited Healing Kitchen in Cat Ba town three times during my stay, and each time was a delightful experience. The food is incredibly fresh, made from locally farmed ingredients that really shine through in every dish. My favorites were the chicken poke and the salmon poke, both bursting with flavor and beautifully presented. The team at Healing Kitchen, especially Anni, Hung, and Z, were fantastic. They were warm, welcoming, and provided great recommendations not only about the menu but also about places to explore around Cat Ba. Their hospitality really added to the overall experience. I stayed in Cat Ba for over a month and tried many places, but Healing Kitchen was definitely the best. If youâ€™re looking for fresh, locally sourced food with a warm and friendly atmosphere, this is the place to go!

Love this beautiful little cafe in the heart of Cat Ba town. The people are sweet and kind. The good is amazing, and it's clear that a LOT of love goes into preparing it. We loved the hot steaming ginger tea, coconut coffee, the Rustic Breakfast Bowl, the Poke bowls. It's all delicious and so lovingly prepared. I highly recommend this little hang out joint in the centre of Cat Ba. The energy and ambience is laid back, gentle and relaxing. The music also suits the relaxing atmosphere. Wish we could have gone there more often had we been staying in Cat Ba for longer.

name: Cat Ba Langur's House
address: No 153 Nui Ngoc Street, Cat Ba Town, Cat Hai, Hai Phong 180001 Vietnam
description: Cat Ba Langur's House: A Culinary Oasis with a Conservation Heart Nestled in the beautiful landscape of Cat Ba Island, Cat Ba Langur's House is more than just a restaurant and coffee shop—it's a delightful culinary destination that connects food lovers with local flavors and wildlife conservation. Our Menu Highlights: Fresh, locally sourced Vietnamese cuisine Specialty coffee featuring locally grown beans Unique dishes inspired by Cat Ba's rich culinary traditions Vegetarian and vegan options available What Makes Us Special: Stunning views of the surrounding natural landscape Cozy, welcoming atmosphere Educational displays about the critically endangered Cat Ba langur Supporting local agriculture and conservation efforts with every purchase
example_reviews: Dịch Beautiful café with spacious space, modern and warm design. The menu ranges from classic drinks such as coffee and tea to unique creations hard to find elsewhere. The service is extremely professional, with warm and attentive staff, always ready to help guests. What distinguishes this place are its original services, offering a new and interesting experience. It’s really a great place to relax, get together with friends or work. Every visit leaves an unforgettable impression. I love this place!

awesome, chill space, good music, delicious drinks and cakes, everyone here is friendly🫶 Cat Ba island is very beautiful, the sea is clear blue, Cat Ba national park is a place worth experiencing. There are many beautiful caves and there are mountain climbing tours.

a rare peaceful space on Cat Ba Island. It is far away from the big construction site. It is an ideal place for me to relax and work. The drinks are great with value beyond my expectations. I sincerely recommend you to come and experience here even just once.

name: Lệ Cát Bà Restaurant
address: 198 đường 1/4, Hai Phong, Cat Ba 187300 Vietnam
description: Nice informal atmosphere to eat with good seafood meal. Also local viet nam come here to eat later in the evening.  After dinner no rush to go and drink some beer
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Cat Ba
Street Food Restaurants in Cat Ba
example_reviews: Nice informal atmosphere to eat with good seafood meal. Also local viet nam come here to eat later in the evening. After dinner no rush to go and drink some beer

Went here with a bunch of friends. The owner and staff were really nice. They served really fast and helped us cook the food when we were busy eating. We will definitely come back to eat here and recommend it to those who love hotpot style.

A really nice little place on the seafront to try some local craft beers, which were delicious. We just had some drinks, chips and even though steamed rice wasn’t on the menu, my friend was craving it and they provided. Service was great despite some minor language barriers which we worked through with Google Translate.

name: Nah Thai Bistro
address: Số 239, Đường Một Tháng Tư Cát Bà, Cát Hải, Hải Phòng, Hai Phong, Cat Ba 05406 Vietnam
description:
A nice place to have dinner, the food is really tasty ! 
We came in family and had the grilled chicken with herbs, a stir fried chiken with cashew nuts and a Tom Yum soup with the creamy both on the recommandation of Thanh the waitress! 
Follow her advices she is really nice and with lot of attentions for you to have a great moment ! 
Cảm ơn again Thanh !!
cuisines: Street Food Restaurants in Cat Ba
Fast Food Restaurants in Cat Ba
European Restaurants for Lunch in Cat Ba
Asian Restaurants for Large Groups in Cat Ba

We came in family and had the grilled chicken with herbs, a stir fried chiken with cashew nuts and a Tom Yum soup with the creamy both on the recommandation of Thanh the waitress! Follow her advices she is really nice and with lot of attentions for you to have a great moment ! Cảm ơn again Thanh !!

We were looking for a place to dine along the coast of Cat ba and noticed this place that immediately impressed us. We entered and were seated at the table. The food was great, I got the shrimp pad thai and it was the end of the world along with a meat dish served over the fire with really delicious sweet and sour sauce. The waiter Hoang was really nice and helpful. The place is highly recommended and is one of the few where I ate really well on Cat Ba Island

I visited this Thai restaurant on Cat Ba Island, and while the food was decent, the real standout was the service. Our waitress, Thanh, was incredibly kind and attentive, making the meal a pleasant experience. If you’re on Cat Ba Island and in the mood for Thai food, it’s worth a visit—especially for the warm and friendly service.

name: Quiri Cocktail & Restaurant
address: No 135 Tùng Dinh, Cat Ba Town, Hai Phong City, Hai Phong, Cat Ba 187380 Vietnam
description: Established in 2018, our family-owned restaurant has proudly achieved 7 consecutive years at the top of TripAdvisor, making it one of the most-visited destinations for international travelers. Over the past 7 years, we’ve delighted 80,000 guests with our exceptional service and warm hospitality. Indulge in the finest traditional cocktails and savor the best local delicacies, crafted with passion and care. ✨ Whether you're here for an unforgettable dining experience or simply to unwind, we promise to make every moment special. ️ Join us and be part of a journey where flavors and memories are made!
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Cat Ba
Street Food Restaurants in Cat Ba
European Restaurants with Buffet in Cat Ba
example_reviews: We were taken here by a cab driver who randomly said he knew the perfect place for us to eat dinner— we owe the driver so much. What we found was really great local seafood and incredible drinks. The staff is super friendly and if they recommend a drink at the bar order it (especially the pho cocktail). You will not be disappointed

Sooooo good, we went twice! Our son said the only fault was it's not in our city back in England. We had the yummy chicken lemongrass, gorgeous grilled fish with rice paper rolls, delicious vegetarian curry, sweet and sour pork, divine cocktails and the loveliest waiters who are family to the chefs. Such beaming, welcoming smiles! Oh, and it's lovely to sit out or almost out with the doors open.

This one was tricky for us to grade , accommodation was very nice and also clean , as usual the locals are up early and with such a nice prominence on the road side there’s always some one zipping around at all hours ,unsettling to perhaps a good snooze. Terrific staff all with character as in a family business. Meals available but we dined out. Breakfast was very slow and far too lethargic, food needs to be upgraded and main portions are too large , a wrong item came to table , other residents politely fumed . Pho was rustic. On a much better note the Black craft beer on tap is excellent, memorable, a true showcase of local talent. The seating area is lovely to rest in. The wee jack and hill biscuits with the coffees are a nice touch . Needs a few tweaks but you get genuine hospitality.

name: Yummy Restaurant
address: 140 Nui Ngoc Street, Cat Ba Town, Hai Phong, Cat Ba 180000 Vietnam
description:
Nice small restaurant in Cat Ba, extensive menu of local cuisine and fresh seafood at very reasonable prices. One of the staff is a native english speaker which helps break the langage barrier! 
The blue crab in tamarin sauce was a delight, brought directly alive from a nearby fishery before cooking, can't get fresher than that.
cuisines: Healthy Restaurants in Cat Ba Town
Fast Food Restaurants in Cat Ba Town
Vietnamese Restaurants for Lunch in Cat Ba Town
example_reviews: Nice small restaurant in Cat Ba, extensive menu of local cuisine and fresh seafood at very reasonable prices. One of the staff is a native english speaker which helps break the langage barrier! The blue crab in tamarin sauce was a delight, brought directly alive from a nearby fishery before cooking, can't get fresher than that.

Cozy little restaurant with a good variety of different Vietnamese dishes. We had 4 different dishes (sweet and sour tofu, spring rolls, pho bo, clams) and everything was really delicious. Prices are comparably high (however acceptable), therfore one star is deducted. Still, great place for streetfood in Cat Ba.

We ate at Yummy 2 (there is also a Yummy 1) twice on our visit to Cat Ba. All five (2 parents, 3 tweens/teens) of us LOVED our meals and a great value. The service was wonderful and the food was some of the best we've had. Such a great experience both times.

name: TexRock Steakhouse
address: 178 Van Cao, Hai Phong 180000 Vietnam
description:
The restaurant specializes in beef steak, beautiful space, European style decor.
Because the restaurant specializes in steak, it is relatively high-end, the price will be a bit high, but the beef steak is very delicious. If you like soft beef, call it fuji beef. The burata fruit salad is extremely delicious and suitable for your taste.
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Hai Phong
Street Food Restaurants in Hai Phong
Chinese Restaurants for Lunch in Hai Phong
example_reviews: The restaurant specializes in beef steak, beautiful space, European style decor. Because the restaurant specializes in steak, it is relatively high-end, the price will be a bit high, but the beef steak is very delicious. If you like soft beef, call it fuji beef. The burata fruit salad is extremely delicious and suitable for your taste.

What a perfect experience for me ! I never regret paying $100 for this beef steak and main course because it is highly-seasoned and juicy. The starter is extremely flavoured. And the cake for dessert is the perfect combination of sweet and sour. 💁🏻‍♀️ The waitresses served very well. Hightly recommend Steak House!

I would recommend to you especially couples. the restaurant is called tex rock. This is a restaurant serving European dishes.The space is decorated in the style of the American west. Very beautiful and very sophisticated. The food is delicious. The decoration is beautiful. Especially the beef steak. The staff is very friendly and helpful. However the price is a bit high compared to the price. nearby restaurants, but the quality of the food and service is very good.

name: Red Ladybird Banh Mi Restaurant  - Pub With Cold Beers
address: 241 Ben Beo Pier, Hai Phong, Cat Ba 460000 Vietnam
description: Red Ladybird Restaurant offers you a authentic local cuisine and excellent coffee with fresh ingredients and organic products selected from our green farmstay in Ao Coi valley. Come to enjoy and experience local savours and oders like no Other !
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Cat Ba
Street Food Restaurants in Cat Ba
example_reviews: Stopped here after the cruise for quick lunch with Vietnamese sandwiches known as Banh Mi topped with cheese, omelette and lettuces which were crunchy and delicious. Mangoes and passion fruits smoothies mixed drink here were really fresh and delicious. Thanks Nga for great care of us

We stopped here for lunch before taking our cruise to Lan Ha bay, the Bánh Mi here was very yummy and crunchy with omelette, mushrooms and pork pâté . Thanks Nga for a great care and excellent food quality. Bravo
Nice place for Yummy Banh Mi and black coffee. This small restaurant is a few steps away the Bèo Harbour. Thanks Tran for a great breakfast

name: Rooftop Hill Pub And Restaurant
address: No 43, 1/4 Street Cat Ba Town, Hai Phong, Cat Ba 187300 Vietnam
description: We’re incredibly proud of our Vietnamese heritage, and proper pub food. With pub classics at the heart of our menus, we’re known across Cat Ba Island and famous for our local dishes and seafood
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Cat Ba
Street Food Restaurants in Cat Ba
Romantic Seafood Restaurants in Cat Ba
example_reviews: I had the pleasure of staying and dining at the hotel. I ate some local food, and it was very good. The service was very fast and efficient, and the prices were very reasonable. I recommend this alternative if you want to stay near the hotel. Furthermore there is a very very nice roof top with sea view.

The hotel bar was excellent! The staff were friendly, professional, and attentive. The drinks were delicious, and the selection was impressive. The atmosphere was cozy and perfect for relaxing. Highly recommended for anyone staying at the hotel!
Very nice rooftop in the center of Cat ba over the city while seeing the sea and good cocktail I had the passionfruit margarita

name: The Bigman Restaurant - Steak House & Fresh Pizza
address: No. 222, 1/4 Street, Hai Phong, Cat Ba 01234 Vietnam
description: Located at the best location of Cat Ba town with amazing seaview, The Bigman Restaurant provide finest cuisine from Local Specials to Western food & Happy time in the BigMan bar
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Cat Ba
Street Food Restaurants in Cat Ba
example_reviews: This place is great! Wonderful service and fantastic drinks. I loved the beautiful decorative plates they used and the owner was nice enough to let me buy one for a good price. Will come back if I’m here again. Thanks again!

My wife and I ate here the other day. It has a western slant on a Vietnamese menu. But you can get burgers and a pint, so a bit of everything really. The staff speaks good English, the prices are written so you can see them, and they give receipts if you ask. It has a western toilet and an upstairs billiard/party room. It is nothing flash, it is a good times bar but perfectly fine to eat at. Give me a helpful vote if you liked my review thanks.

We headed to this place because we wanted to watch the women's world cup final and basically never ate anywhere else during our stay as we were so wowed by the food and incredible range of delicious drinks. The raspberry ice crush must be tried. Mark, Sarah Annie and Megan

name: Cat Ba Oasis Bungalow and Restaurant
address: 254 Street 1/4, Hai Phong, Cat Ba 180000 Vietnam
description: As its stated name, we are offering guests with variety of choices including accommodation, western food and Vietnamese food menu and a lot of cocktails, mocktail, coffee, fruit juice and smoothies and so on. Located in the center of Cat Ba Town, it features with separated cottage bungalow of 32 rooms, a swimming pool in a very spacious green area. With many years experienced and friendly team, we do hope to provide guests with better services when you come to drink, to eat and to stay. We are hornor to welcome you all and trying to make your stay comfortable and relaxing.
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Cat Ba
Street Food Restaurants in Cat Ba
example_reviews: I got relaxing time at this beautiful Buanglow. I love the site of location, it is near the Beaches, quite and comfortable. I give 5 ⭐ for construction and atmosphere there. All most hotels on Cat Ba island are high building and decorated by small plants or lighting lamps. This Bungalow is different with swimming pool and big giant trees. The staffs are helpful and friendly. They are the useful local guide for your trip! Food and drink are delicious and good price. Highly recommend!

My boyfriend and I are in Vietnam for 3 weeks and we decided to got to Cat Ba for 3 days. We booked at all nights at the Le Pont Bungalow (also amazing spot). While here, we went to the Oasis 2 bar every day for drinks and food (amazing happy hour specials!!). We decided to stay a fourth night in Cat Ba so we could have a night at this incredibly peaceful and gorgeous bungalow. The beds were cozy, heater worked well and the water was hot! I went for a cool dip in the pool before breakfast as a nice wake up after a fun night out! I can’t wait to come back to Cat Ba in the future and stay here!! Thank you to all the friendly staff and thank you for the delicious drinks!!!

We found this little gem whilst walking down town..it was right nxt to our hotel..what a lovely atmosphere and friendly place..the food and drinks were delicious and the staff really made us welcome..all in all a great little restaurant..

name: Flame Grill & Bar
address: 12 Lach Tray Ngo Quyen District, Hai Phong 180000 Vietnam
description: Flame restaurant gets its name from the iconic flower of Hai Phong city, along with the flame-grilled meat that featured prominently on the menu. Flame offers a large selection of flame-grilled meat and seafood in a buffet or a la carte setting. This multi-purpose restaurant offers the finest international cuisines alongside Vietnamese specialties, Korean barbecue, Japanese dishes or Western favourites.
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Hai Phong
Street Food Restaurants in Hai Phong
example_reviews: I have eaten at the Mercure's Flame Restaurant a number of times, enjoying the steak or the chicken wrap with dragonfruit for dessert. The food is delicious, service is excellent, and the atmosphere is cozy and clean. I recommend this restaurant for anyone who wants to get off the streets of Haiphong and enjoy good from around the world, whether you are dining on Korean Bibimbab to Western Style Gluten-Free Burgers.

The place is amazing. It was my birthday, decoration and stuff where so fantastic. Calm place with friends. Specially Mr.Huy was so friendly and he pay attention to details and see if we need something, he took pictures for us also, and a smile is alwags in his face. All the stuff are friendly. I recommand this place for those who want to have their birthday unmemorable.

When searching for Flame and Mercure on Facebook, I thought their signature is steak but their sahbu hotpot is surprisingly exceptional. Beef, vegetables, udon and the broth are so good. I even came to ask Mr Dung and Mr Dat Kitchen for how to make it such amazing. Must try if you are a hotpot lover. Nice service and caring staff too

name: No 1986 Coffee
address: 33 Đinh Tien Hoang Hong Bang, Hai Phong 180000 Vietnam
description: I am so impressive by the unique architecture of this coffee shop in Hai Phong. I love the taste of delicious cakes though it is kind of costly. I will come back soon. Now they are expanding with two other branches and coffee lovers can have other options of 1986 cafe!
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Hai Phong
Street Food Restaurants in Hai Phong

example_reviews: I am so impressive by the unique architecture of this coffee shop in Hai Phong. I love the taste of delicious cakes though it is kind of costly. I will come back soon. Now they are expanding with two other branches and coffee lovers can have other options of 1986 cafe!

Went during Lunar New year and it was sooo busy. Long queue and ineffective till service. Confusing trying to find table. Card machine not connected to internet and so annoying not able to pay by card. However, polite young staff and with incredible interior. Small menu. Clean and fresh. 4 cold drinks, not fully filled with half content of ice (New Year cheapness?). Tiramisu and velvet cake ok but short bread cake amazing. 511,000VND though ($22)!! Not an everyday coffee shop but more for special occasion kind of meet ups.

This coffee shop has very nice decoration inside, the combination of plants and furniture make good atmosphere here. The drinks were good but still limitation for menu, anyway it still has all the basic drink.

name: Lepont Bar Sunset View
address: GẦN BÃI TẮM CÁT CÒ 3 Mô Vịnh Đồng Hồ, gần bãi tắm Cát Cò 3, thị trấn Cát Hải, Hải Phòng, Hai Phong, Cat Ba 05406 Vietnam
description: Lepont is an excellent restaurant just outside the center of Cat Ba. Great service that tries to do everything to make guests happy. The waiter Duong DC was particularly professional, thanks to him we had a nice time there every time. Very tasty meals, lots of choice. The location and decor make it a pleasant time to spend there. Prices similar to other restaurants. The price-quality ratio is very good. you can count on happy hour between 6 p.m. and 8 p.m.

The waiter Duong DC was particularly professional, thanks to him we had a nice time there every time. Very tasty meals, lots of choice. The location and decor make it a pleasant time to spend there. Prices similar to other restaurants. The price-quality ratio is very good. you can count on happy hour between 6 p.m. and 8 p.m.

We originally stopped here for a drink as it was 1/2 way between Cat Co (beach 3) and our hotel in Cat Ba town. The view is amazing, and the beer's cold. By chance we were lucky enough to catch the sunset which was just beautiful. We noticed that they had fish and seafood in tanks, and decided to come back to eat. We had Grouper (with steamed rice and morning glory) which was just delicious, probably the best meal we had had in our holiday to Vietnam (apart from maybe the Halong Bay cruise). In fact it was so good, we decided to eat here on our last night. This time we had red snapper and prawns, again delicious. The staff are really friendly and helpful and speak great English.

Perfect restaurant to enjoy a breathtaking sunset. Staff is super friendly and speaks English. Great value for money. Modern, clean toilets with fresh, small, disposable cotton towels. Highly recommended!

name: Napoli Pizza - Cafe
address: 86 Núi Ngọc, TT., Cat Ba Town, Hai Phong, Cat Ba Vietnam
description: Wood fired pizza, salad, burger, spaghetti and local , vegetarian, vegan food. We always prepare fresh ingredient everyday . beside on, we also serverd drinks which included cocktail, soft drink, fresh juice, smoothie and wine .
cuisines: Healthy Restaurants in Cat Ba Town
Fast Food Restaurants in Cat Ba Town
Vietnamese Restaurants for Lunch in Cat Ba Town
example_reviews: Best food on the island by far, amazing service and lovely staff. Smoothie bowls so nice and fresh, pizza wood fired to perfection and the spaghetti is perfect. Very good prices too
Amazing Italian food: Pizza's made in wood-oven, real olive oil and tabasco on the table. All for Vietnamese prices! What every European needs after a long time of eating local kitchen!

The pizza is really good, although there’s some salt missing. The menu shows 30cm pizzas, but the truth is just 23-24cm. So that’s the point why just 4 points. Beside this I would visit again, nice staff also!

name: Cat Ba Oasis Bar
address: No. 228 Street 1-4 Cat Ba Town Hai Phong Viet Nam, Hai Phong, Cat Ba 180000 Vietnam
description: Located right at Cat Ba Welcome Gate, Cat Ba Oasis Bar features itself as the most interesting must come, must see and must experience iconic place in Cat Ba Town. Facing forward to Cat Ba Harbour, it is an ideal viewpoint to see sunset in everyday. With capacity of approximately 150 seats, Cat Ba Oasis Bar is a western styled bar offering western food, international music and DJ, cocktail, mocktail, whisky, smoothies and fruit juice as well as coffee, espresso, capuchino and variety of entertaining international live music performance.
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Cat Ba
Street Food Restaurants in Cat Ba
example_reviews: Really friendly service, half price drinks from 5pm til 12am, good enough food for the price. Good atmosphere with a pool table. Perfect spot for a few drinks and some grub, especially when the Haiphong beer is 10k during Happy Hour. One of our favourite places in Cat Ba for an evening

A definite must when in Cat Ba. Great place for a drink - awesome Happy Hour!! 10,000 dong big beers 5-9PM (think cheapest $1 beers youve ever had) and 50% cocktails 3PM-Midnight. The "Thai gourmet" cocktail is amazing. Mr. Win is great with drink and food suggestions. And if you decide to eat there, Phong is a magician in the kitchen. Ended up coming here 2 nights in a row. Definitely recommend.

Nice place with a very, very expanded menu. They serve good food, just don’t try the nachos. We have been here three nights on a row to have a drink on the terrace. They have special actions like 10k VND for a draught beer and 50% off cocktails. From 22:00 to 22:30 the beer was free. They have a pool table inside and play really nice music. Sometimes just a little loud. I would recommend going there!

name: Manoir Cafe
address: 16 Lê Đại Hành, Hai Phong 180000 Vietnam
description: Manoir Cafe is home to a wide range of flowers and foliage. The outdoor seating area is an ideal place to unwind after a busy working day in the office. Garden Manoir Cafe is the setting to enjoy our organized outdoor activities as night music or barbecued parties. The place where you can delight in our breath-taking scenery.
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Hai Phong
Street Food Restaurants in Hai Phong
French Restaurants for Lunch in Hai Phong
Japanese Restaurants with Private Dining in Hai Phong
example_reviews: This is really a nice place that you should drop by. If you wanna go somewhere for a coffee, try this one. You won't ever regret! Not only are the food and service good but the European style and the intimate atmosphere here can also bring about good views. Moreover, it is located on Le Dai Hanh street - right in the heart of the city - and just under 1 km away to the Opera House and the square. It's convenient to discover this city. By the way, I would like to give thanks to staff Lan Anh for her enthusiasm and help while I were enjoying my time there!

My colleagues said having coffee here in the morning was great. They were right. I sat here last Sunday morning, drank coffee and worked on laptop. It was so comfortable that I spent the whole morning here. Oh I had a strong impression on a staff named Minh Hieu. I didn’t take any notice that my scarf had dropped and he picked it up for me in silence as he didn’t want to disturb me. Thank you so much and I hope to meet you the next time.

I went around noon, so it was easy to check in. The space is cozy, there is a view everywhere, beautiful and minimalistic design. The tone of the shop with white and black colors creates a comfortable feeling. I recomend that everyone should go early in the morning to have many beautiful pictures. Especially the staff is very enthusiastic, I am impressed with you The Tai

name: Ganesh Indian Restaurant
address: 171 Street 1/4, Hai Phong, Cat Ba 180000 Vietnam
description: the first time come in cat ba island. Incredible variety of food, good vegetarian options!
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Cat Ba
Street Food Restaurants in Cat Ba
Romantic Seafood Restaurants in Cat Ba
example_reviews: The order of service is a bit unusual. Food is brought to one person while the others wait, but absolutely everything was delicious - fish with Indian spices, lamb curry, and seafood curry. Mango curry with prawns tastes a bit too mild, but that's a matter of taste. Fresh juices, lassi, bread with house cheese... everything was great.

The food was amazing 🤩 very authentic Indian cooking with very generous serves. We had butter chicken, lamb Punjabi curry, saffron rice and garlic naan bread. Couldn’t fault 😋 would definitely recommend 😍

Excellent food, very friendly staff and at a reasonable price. We got a starter, two mains, garlic naan, whiskey coke and 4 beers and it came to just over 600k VND. Really tasty food, just as good if not better than at home in expensive restaurants. Nice position on the waterfront but away from the crowds. Some of the best Indian food we have had in Vietnam!

name: Gia Vien
description: Last time I was there, my agency hold a big events in their biggest hall. It was the same hall where my brother got married. The hall was huge and nice with nice decoration, big stage and screen. They have places for small group of guesses, for holding wedding and for big events. The food was nice and delicious. But everytime my agency ordered the same kind so I didn't know what other food tasted like. They were reallt common food such as steamed shrims, chicken soup, sweet rice, roasted duck with honey, steak, etc. I tried to have coffee in the yard and garden area once. The drinks was not really special but it was nice.

this restaurant is spread across a vast area and has common hall. besides some private rooms on the second (first) floor, which too are quite spacious.besides, they have a well stacked bar too.
This is so large restaurant in this city. Everything sound good from staff to decoration. This also an ideal place to hold party or wedding

name: Nam Phuong Restaurant
address: Avani Hai Phong Harbour View Hotel 12 Tran Phu Street, Hai Phong 35000 Vietnam
description: Nam Phuong Restaurant is a showcasing classic Vietnamese cuisines from all parts of the country. Additionally we feature famous dishes from our Southeast Asian neighbors: Thailand, Malaysia and Indonesia and others
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Hai Phong
Street Food Restaurants in Hai Phong
Sushi Restaurants for Lunch in Hai Phong
Thai Restaurants for Lunch in Hai Phong
example_reviews: The restaurant decoration was lovely and friendly staff speaking English. Must try this Vietnamese specialty menu, Delicious with full points of foods presentation. The price was very reasonable, and I highly recommended this place.
Could have warming dinner time Especially vietnamese food with wine Warm places with some special person
I tried pork and taro purses was so good, seafood fried rice, pumpkin soup was also good. The bun Cha and square crab roll waere good. Just love it

name: Gentleman Lounge
address: 64 Dien Bien Phu, Hai Phong 04100 Vietnam
description: Conveniently located on the first floor of Manoir Des Arts Hotel, the Gentleman Lounge is a spot for signature cocktails, wine collections, cigars and spirits in Hai Phong. This luxurious space and unique design combining with ancient French Style and modernity is the best place to celebrate parties, events and special occasions such as Halloween, Christmas, New Year., etc.
cuisines: Street Food Restaurants in Hai Phong
Fast Food Restaurants in Hai Phong
Thai Restaurants for Lunch in Hai Phong
example_reviews: My friends and I wanted to have some drinks for a lovely night. All staff were very friendly and helpful. I ordered Gin-Tonic but my Tonic cans had small mistake so I couldn't open it myself. Bartender Minh Hieu helped me to fix and open it. Thank you very much.

Been there in a friend's birthday party and I was amazed by the service at such high level. The staffs were super friendly and helpful, especially the manager in charge Mr. Hieu. He helped us taking tons of beautiful photos, not to mention his great knowledge of the food and polite manner. Can't wait to be there once again for another perfect experience.

You were very good at recommending cocktails to us who don't know much about cocktails. The taste, service, atmosphere, and view are all the best. Minh Hieu bartender is the best!! If you come to Hai Phong, definitely come here ♡

name: Nguyen Chat Coffee Tea & Restaurant
address: Đường 1/4 Cát Bà, Cat Ba Town, Hai Phong, Cat Ba 187310 Vietnam
description: Pure Coffee - Tea & Restaurant. Located on the 1st floor of Hotel Paradise Hotel - Sky Bar & Massage Offering: Coffee, Seafood, Asian, Healthy SPECIAL DIET Vegetarian Friendly, Vegan Options, Gluten Free Options MEAL Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner, Brunch, Late Night
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Cat Ba Town
Healthy Restaurants in Cat Ba Town
Vietnamese Restaurants for Lunch in Cat Ba Town
example_reviews: During our recent trip to Cat Ba Island, we stumbled upon Nyugen Chat Coffee while searching for a banana boat ride. Though we didn’t find the ride, we were delighted by our brunch experience at this charming café. Ambiance: Nyugen Chat Coffee has a welcoming vibe with cozy decor, making it an ideal spot to relax and enjoy a meal. The atmosphere was perfect for a leisurely brunch. Service: Elvis and his colleague provided exceptional service, going out of their way to accommodate our vegetarian preferences, which is often a challenge in Vietnam. Their attentiveness made our visit even more enjoyable. Menu: We ordered a coconut coffee, cold coffee with chocolate, and a banana smoothie, all of which were refreshing and delicious. For our meal, we chose a vegetarian pizza and French fries. To our surprise, the quality of the food exceeded our expectations, proving that finding vegetarian options in Vietnam is possible! Dinner Visit: Impressed by our brunch, we returned for dinner and tried crispy vegetable rolls, vegetarian pasta with tomato sauce, and a vegetarian hot pot. Each dish was flavorful, but the hot pot was a standout—an amazing first-time experience for us. Value for Money: Both our brunch and dinner offered good value, with generous portions and quality ingredients. Conclusion: With its great food, inviting atmosphere, and friendly service, we highly recommend Nyugen Chat Coffee, especially for vegetarians and Indian travelers. It's a gem on Cat Ba Island!

We’ve been looking forward to trying vegetarian food at cat ba , and was so glad that we did! The food was so delicious and the service was really great, too!” Elvis was so polite and helpful, going above and beyond to make us welcome. Thanks Elvis for the wonderful care given to us. Forever repeat customers ❤️
Elvis the waiter is super friendly, he took care of us very well and made us laugh. The sunset skybar is wonderful. We didn't stay but it looks good, 51 Dollars a night I think I remember. Cheers!

name: Pause And Enjoy Da Nang
address: 17 Yên Bái, Hai Chau, Da Nang 550000 Vietnam
description: Pause and Enjoy Restaurant -Top 5 the best restaurant in Hoi An city. We are thrilled to announce about our new restaurant branch at Da Nang! After months of preparation and hard work, we are excited to finally welcome you to our latest location, where we will continue to offer the same exceptional dining experience you have come to love. At our new branch, we aim to bring a fresh and inviting atmosphere, combined with a delectable menu that features both your favorite dishes and exciting new flavors. Whether you're coming for a special occasion or simply want to enjoy a cozy meal, our restaurant is the perfect place to gather with friends and family. To celebrate this special occasion, we offer exclusive promotions during our opening week, along with special events and surprises you won't want to miss! Come join us as we embark on this new journey. We look forward to serving you and making every meal a memorable one! **Location:** 17 Yen Bai str, Da Nang city, Vietnam ⏰ **Openin
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Hai Chau
Street Food Restaurants in Hai Chau
example_reviews: It’s our first time to visit Vietnam, we arrived at Hoi an. Our hotel was Bel Marina, they recommended us to try out this restaurant which was located in the buzzing area of Hoi An. When we were there, the staff welcomed us warmly and the decorations was vibrant and illustrated the culture of Vietnamese. The staff then went on to recommend some of the signature dishes which is a must try. Oh Boy! I love their Pho Ga (noodles with chicken), it was light yet flavourful and warms up your stomach and alleviate my fatigue especially after a long day touching down in Vietnam. My husband ordered their bun cha, we have never seen nor eaten this dish in Singapore. So it was really a surprise and the sauce goes really well with the rice noodles and a great pairing with the meat platter. Each meat has different texture and taste varies slightly. It was a delightful and dimensional dish. At the end of the meal, the staff served us complimentary fruits! We were amazed by their service and hospitality! Thank you so much Miss Oanh! Oh and yes she speaks perfect English and took pride to explain each dish patiently. Definitely would recommend anyone in Hoi An to drop by and try!!! It was so nice that we went to their Danang outlet as our journey was from Hoi An to Danang. Needless to say I ordered my favourite pho ga. My husband tried their garlic butter prawns. We also tried their spring rolls and fried wantons! It’s really yummy. Though it was fried but it doesn’t taste cloying nor greasy. Please try !

You know the food is good when the tourists dined in from Hoi An and also their new place in Danang! Ordered their pause special starter which consists of fried wonton, fried spring roll and fresh spring roll. Their fried wonton is really amazing, is easy to eat and every mouthful is a burst of flavours that will just explode in your mouth. Their fried spring roll is nicely executed! Though it was fried but it doesn’t taste greasy nor cloying! I ordered the pho ga again! It’s just me! Really love their soup that warms your stomach after a long day! We also ordered their stir fried prawns with garlics, the sauce goes really well with the garlic (add a sunny side up like us) because it goes really well with the sauce and rice and everything! I would definitely recommend this place to first time tourists to try out! The guy speaks good English and very welcoming, I don’t feel intimidated as I don’t speak a single word of Vietnamese. Prices are stated clearly, so don’t worry. Food: 5/5 | Service: 5/5 | Atmosphere: 5/5 Vegetarian options They can cater to non meat eater too! Dietary restrictions Can share with them

The service was outstanding and the food was top quality and very delicious. We had the mango papaya salad with tofu. It was very tasty and juicy. The mixed plate with starters was amazing especially the wontons. Very fresh shrimps in delicious tamarind sauce.

name: Fatfish Restaurant & Lounge Bar
address: 439 Đ. Trần Hưng Đạo, Da Nang 550000 Vietnam
description: Fatfish was created by gastronomes, for gastronomes! Our concept is simple: fresh, stunning quality ingredients, prepared with passion . We offer contemporary cuisine in a stylish, relaxed, riverfront venue, and are proud to be ranked as Lonely Planet’s top pick for dining in Da Nang. With our own in house bakery, outstanding craft beers, and a carefully selected wine and cocktail list, Fatfish is the place to indulge your taste buds!
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Da Nang
Street Food Restaurants in Da Nang
South American Restaurants for Lunch in Da Nang
Spanish Restaurants for Lunch in Da Nang
example_reviews: Came across this restaurant whilst walking through the town and stopped for an afternoon cocktail. Funny thing was I didn’t realise until seated that I had read good reviews on trip advisor and had chosen this as one of the places we would eat at over the weekend as it is was close to the dragon bridge for the fire and water display. Had a fabulous meal all dishes had great flavours we had share plates all were delicious cocktails were yummy and hubby had a desert which he enjoyed. Staff were attentive and friendly. Price is midrange four cocktails, four small meals and one dessert AUS $104

I highly recommend visiting this restaurant. The food is incredible, full of knowledge and very well made! We ordered a starter, recommended by the house, the “falafels”, a dish to share with “ribs”, the best I have ever eaten, they melted in the mouth! and to drink passion fruit juice it is a soda. While we waited for our orders, we were offered some kind of fried bread with a delicious tomato sauce! We loved the experience. The only problem was that on Google the restaurant said it was closed, but we decided to go anyway and were surprised to find it open. We have alerted staff to correct this issue.

This was my favorite restaurant in Danang before Covid. And amazingly, they only have gotten better. The menu has been revamped with stronger seafood options. The scallops and whole fish special were both cooked and presented perfectly. The pork ribs were awesome and great value for the money. The crispy pork belly was the best I’ve ever had. In addition, they now are offering heart of darkness beers on draft. Hart of darkness is my favorite microbrew in Vietnam and I am so happy they’re not offering it at fat fish! Also the cocktails have improved. The signature Fat fish cocktail is now served with a BFC (big f’ing cube) so it retains the strength and flavor that was intended. Honestly, this is one of the best restaurants ever visited in all of my travels.

name: Veteran Restaurant
address: 126B Hồng Bàng, Nha Trang 57100 Vietnam
description: Veteran Restaurant là nhà hàng chuyên về các món thịt nướng chất lượng cao, vị trí tại trung tâm thành phố Nha Trang, địa chỉ 126B Hồng Bàng. Chúng tôi tự hào mang đến trải nghiệm ẩm thực tuyệt vời với những món ăn được chế biến từ nguồn nguyên liệu tươi ngon và công thức độc đáo. Thực đơn của chúng tôi đa dạng, bao gồm thịt bò Waygu Nhật Bản, Thịt heo nuôi tại Đà Lạt, canh kim chi, mỳ lạnh, mỳ tương đen, hải sản tôm mực,... nhiều đồ ăn kèm miễn phí. Phù hợp cho cặp đôi, gia đình hoặc tiệc bàn bè Không gian nhà hàng được thiết kế sang trọng, rộng rãi với hệ thống điều hòa không khí, mang đến cảm giác thoải mái cho thực khách. Đội ngũ nhân viên thân thiện và chuyên nghiệp luôn sẵn sàng phục vụ, đảm bảo khách hàng có những phút giây hài lòng nhất. Hãy ghé thăm Veteran Restaurant để tận hưởng hương vị thơm ngon khó quên từ những món thịt nướng tuyệt hảo!

example_reviews: When you come to Natrang, the child continues to not eat food and find a meal, and the reviews are so good. It is really delicious. If you want to eat high-quality meal in Korea, it's just over two thousand yuan. Of course, if you taste meal in the service, it will be expensive for Vietnamese meals, but I think it's a really good price.

It seems like it's overcrowded, food, and moved Korea. Anyone who misses a meal should come here - especially if you are thoroughly educating the staff - and the meat baking service is satisfied! I want my parents to come later.

Veteran visited on the evening of the first day of the trip. I also liked the arduous meat and various snacks. The meat was soft and Kimchi, who baked it with me, was sweet. The meat plate is fine. Koreans are also triplets. Dinner was good.

name: Altitude Rooftop Bar
address: 26-28 Tran Phu Street Sheraton Nha Trang Hotel & Spa, Nha Trang 650000 Vietnam
description: From the 28th floor, Altitude boasts a luxurious character and panoramic views in the heart of Nha Trang. Feel the music industry's latest beats with our guest DJs . This bar can also serve as a remarkable event space to mesmerize your guests. By day, sunlight pours in through wraparound windows and illuminates the gleaming white marble floors. By night, the shimmering lights of busy Nha Trang create a spectacular backdrop. Sip champagne with your closest friends and family as the sun sets, then celebrate into the early hours in ultimate style.
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Nha Trang

Late Night Mexican Restaurants in Nha Trang
example_reviews: I came here yesterday for New Year’s Eve with a couple of friends and family and the food was absolutely Devine it was perfectly cooked and the presentation of it was unbelievable. In the restaurant everything was so organized and our waitress Ariana made our experience at altitude so much better with her perfect manors and a bright smile she was so polite and made sure we had everything we possibly needed so a big thank you to her. Happy new years all x

The snacks at Altitude bar, including cocktails and French fries, were very delicious, and the cocktails were also very delicious. Peach...? The cocktail was so delicious that I want to drink it again the next time I visit Nha Trang😍 Even though it was a hotel, the price was reasonable and it was very nice. I also liked that the staff were friendly. I especially liked that Linh was friendly💗 Thank u Linh💗

We went to Altitude for sunset drinks, and had a fantastic time. They had a huge drinks menu, there is definitely something for everyone. We had a very early morning start the next day, so asked them to make 2 non-alcholic mojitos, which were great. The view from the bar is amazing. You won't get any other view like this in Nha Trang. The only downside is that there was someone blasting very loud music from the beach, and even all the way up at Altitude bar, we could hear their music! Otherwise, it's a great place to relax and enjoy a tipple after a long day out in Nha Trang.

name: Xóm Mới Garden
address: 144 Võ Trứ, phường Tân Lập, Nha Trang 650000 Vietnam
description: Fantastic food, it is the place for people that like quality food adequately priced in a casual atmosphere (not suitable for romantic occasions). We ordered ribs, chicken in passion fruit sauce, mango smoothies and everything (every single detail) was delicious! I am amazed how the kitchen can serve so many customers that fast and keep the quality so good

It's so, so delicious. The banh xeo and nem nueng here are really delicious and the staff prepares it right next to you, so it's really convenient. If you order rice noodles mixed with rice, even the kids will enjoy a bowl. If you order beef rice noodles, it tastes like galbitang soup. It's definitely a choice. Be sure to come. The price is not cheap, but you will be treated well and comfortably, so if you come, you will not regret it.

Authentic Vietnamese cuisine, with a waiter making hand rolls directly in front of the guests, features, Vietnamese coconut coffee must try. Potatoes and pork dishes are worth a try. The environment has Vietnamese characteristics.

example_reviews: The staff is very accommodating . They offer seafood buffet every day which many choices of season and that price include wine beer and other beverages choices . The price is very reasonable . Shoutout to each and every staff and specially Ricky

When I enter the restaurant I feel very comfy and cozy, the music help me relaxed and chilling. The food decoration make the expensive feeling rising in my mind, the taste of the foods are wonderful and excellent but I don’t like watermelon juice because it doesn’t sweet like usual watermelon, the waiters are friendly and kind, they served me very nicely and professionally. Thank you for the excellent experience

The variety of food was so varied and delicious that I had a very filling breakfast. There is also a kids zone for children, and my child loved it because it was decorated with Peppa Pig balloons, which he loves. I think Sheraton lives up to its name everywhere. In particular, there were Korean staff members, including Hoeyun and Minsun, who came directly to ask if there were any inconveniences and took care of them, so I was grateful.

I was strolling down with my wife when I stumbled on this place. Well we thought it looked nice and stuff, so we decided to check its reviews on Google Maps, and boom. Me and my wife were not expecting any of that lmao. So we gave this place a try. My first thought was that the staff here were all nice, I couldn't even think of a time that they stopped smiling with us. We ordered a big grilled-cheese rock lobster, and the staff even peeled it for us. We didn't have to do anything lol, and all we needed to do was eat. The price overall was not expensive to me, despite us ordering two lobsters. And that's it. You all should give this place a shot if you ever have the chance to visit Nha Trang.

The menu features a fantastic selection of fresh seafood, with the grilled fish and crispy duck garlic standout dishes. The friendly and attentive staff enhance the dining experience with their helpful recommendations. Whether you're a local or a visitor, Ca Bay is a must-visit for delicious food and a cozy ambiance. Highly recommended!

name: Ngon Gallery Nha Trang
address: 62 Trần Phú 2nd Floor, Citadines Bayfront Hotel, Nha Trang 58000 Vietnam
description: At Ngon Gallery, we are the first Unlimited Lobster restaurant and proud to serve some of the best local and international-influenced dishes. Using the freshest locally-sourced ingredients, we serve the specialties of each city and add the other classics from East to West cuisines.

example_reviews: Uncommon place, many groups but unusual atmosphere Pianist and singer, impeccable service especially our hostess Alice Large selection of seafood, raw and cooked fish, side dishes and desserts. The lobsters were perfect for an extra charge of about 80 euros with 2 whole lobsters buffets and drinks, Very good value for money for a lobster dinner and show. There's even an all-you-can-eat lobster package.

The price was quite high for Vietnam, ranging from 6,000 to 10,000 yen per person, but the food was delicious, and the atmosphere was great with singing in the background. I recommend it as a way to end your trip! I didn't order any alcohol, probably because it was an additional charge.

My child said he wanted to eat lobster, so I came here. I said I couldn't eat lobster because I was full, but I kept eating because of the song sung by a great singer and the friendliness and atmosphere of the staff. Everything was good except that it was a little hot. Especially Peter and Ellis took care of it. He was very kind. He took care of the surroundings so that I could take pictures, and when he served the last cocktail to see if the food was delicious, he let the kids try it one at a time. The kids had a great time, and the songs they sang were good. We were listening to pop songs that my father likes. I think you would have really liked it, so I hope you come with me next time.

name: Livin - Nha Trang
address: 5a Ngo Thoi Nhiem Tan Lap, Nha Trang 650000 Vietnam
description: Established in 2015, LIVIN – Nha Trang is a casual restaurant deep-rooted from the traditions of American barbecue. Balancing between traditions, cultures, and innovation; we hope to create, inspire, and share a wide-range of classic to new-American dishes. Our Mission is to serve our customers an honest, delicious, and an amazing experience.
cuisines: Street Food Restaurants in Nha Trang
Fast Food Restaurants in Nha Trang
Mediterranean Restaurants with Private Dining in Nha Trang
example_reviews: If you're a brisket enthusiast in Vietnam, look no further than Livin Nha Trang. This hidden gem takes the crown for serving the best brisket in the country, making it a must-visit for meat lovers. The star of the show at Livin Nha Trang is undoubtedly their brisket. Bursting with flavor and tenderness, each bite is a heavenly experience. The succulent, slow-cooked brisket is perfectly seasoned and melts in your mouth, delivering a delightful blend of smoky and savory notes. Combine brisket with the warm tortillas, fresh toppings, and zesty sauces, the brisket tacos become a culinary masterpiece that will leave you craving more. I have had them three times in one week Beyond the brisket tacos, Livin Nha Trang offers a range of other tantalizing dishes that showcase their expertise in meat preparation. The quality and consistency of the brisket are truly remarkable, guaranteeing a memorable dining experience every time. Apart from the outstanding food, Livin Nha Trang provides a welcoming and relaxed atmosphere. The friendly staff members are passionate about their craft and are more than happy to guide you through the menu and recommend the perfect pairing. The cozy and casual setting adds to the overall enjoyment of the meal, making it a great spot to gather with friends or family. While Livin Nha Trang's focus is primarily on their standout brisket dishes, they also offer a decent selection of sides and beverages to complement your meal. Whether you're in the mood for crispy fries, refreshing salads, or a cold craft beer, they have you covered. In terms of value, Livin Nha Trang delivers on both taste and portion sizes. The prices are reasonable considering the high quality of the ingredients and the mouthwatering flavors you'll experience. In conclusion, Livin Nha Trang is a haven for brisket lovers in Vietnam. With their unparalleled brisket tacos and an array of flavorful dishes, they have undoubtedly perfected the art of brisket preparation. Prepare yourself for a taste sensation that will linger on your palate long after your visit. Don't miss the opportunity to savor the best brisket Vietnam has to offer at Livin Nha Trang!

We were recommended this place by our friends, upon arrival it smelt absolutely incredible and the choice on the menu was great! The food from start to finish was honestly some of the nicest and tastiest food weve eaten since visiting Vietnam. The steak was cooked to perfection just how we wanted it and the pulled pork loaded fries for starter were definitely my favourite dish! 10/10 would definitely recommend and return here in the future

We fancied a meat/BBQ selection whilst on our Vietnam trip and came across this place. We were certainly not disappointed! We shared the 2 person meat selection which is served with coleslaw & pickles. The meats were cooked & smoked to absolute perfection and we just didn’t want it to end! We ordered a side of fries to share and there was more than plenty of food. The staff are great, the wine was good and well chilled. The place has a great vibe and quick service. A couple of bits that would make it perfect: -the bathrooms could do with a paint/mini refurb -the restaurant is above another and it’s a little hard to find/misleading at first. More signage would be good! If you are visiting Nha Trang and like your meat - 100% visit here, you will not be disappointed!

On the second day, we ate fish and seafood, and it was delicious, so on the third day we visited Nanjing.
Try beef rice fries and beef rice sauce and seafood rice sauce!!^^

I really recommend this place!! The cleanest thing is base. But you are surrounded. Shit... shit 🙏 Basker of Baskham is a real recommend 🙂 There are plenty of swamps! I liked rabbit, and it's really delicious. One of the foods you ate at the Natrans can be put in five fingers. Make sure to try Crayfish Combo. I've come over to eat this because I booked Fullville to black. Still remembering taste. I'll eat it again. Next time I'll do one day. name: Alpaca Homestyle Cafe
address: 10/1B Nguyen Thien Thuat Ground floor, Nha Trang 650000 Vietnam
description: Alpaca, is the cozy homestyle cafe with the good-quality meals and frienly atmosphere. We love to experiment with different recipes, adding something new from time to time to our small menu where you can find some vegetarian and healthy options.
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Nha Trang
Street Food Restaurants in Nha Trang
Late Night BBQ Restaurants in Nha Trang
review_summary:
Alpaca Homestyle Cafe's inviting atmosphere garners praise for being both cozy and exceptional, a sentiment reflected in the attentive service that guests appreciate, especially the multilingual proficiency of the staff. The cafe's dishes receive mixed reviews, with some guests commending the freshness and presentation, while others find the taste and portions lacking.

Although the food's quality is a point of contention, with opinions divided on whether it justifies the price, the restaurant still stands out for its overall welcoming ambiance and friendly service.
example_reviews: Very tasty, cheesecakes are flying out every day. I booked 2 days in advance so that they would postpone it for us 😊 very often there are no empty seats, it is advisable to book a table in advance for breakfast too. I took oatmeal, they can cook it with oat milk, without sugar. You can also make scramble purely from egg whites. My husband took pancakes, which were also delicious. This is the second time we’ve come for breakfast, I highly recommend it!

DELICIOUS 😋 and very pretty inside. European cuisine is common to many, not pho bo soups for breakfast. Many Russian-speaking visitors and Europeans. The pancakes are delicious, tender (2pcs per serving) enough to eat in the morning, the price is 80-100 dong per serving depending on the filling. There are cheeses 105 dong, also delicious, but the portion is small, cheeses the size of an elephant's nipple :))) one portion of vryatli is enough for you. Pumpkin soup is delicious, Vietnamese coffee is delicious. We've been here three times already and I love it.

We had breakfast here and ordered the zucchini omelette, bruschetta and granola with strawberries. Everything was delicious and the portions were very generous. Our iced latte was also very large, with perfect milk foam and a small delicious cookie. The staff were also super friendly and accommodating!! We'll be happy to come back.

name: Sweet Secret
address: Ngyuễn Thiện Thuật, P. Lộc Thọ 35/97 - 35/99, Nha Trang 650000 Vietnam
description: HEALTHY BREAKFASTS AND DESSERTS IN NHA TRANG && 100% natural ingredients. CLASSIC RAW FOOD PRODUCTS ВЕГ VEGAN CAKES
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Nha Trang
