example_reviews: Went into this place, and you know, it was good. They took soup and cheesecakes, redcurrants and cocoa from aisti drinks, all fresh and delicious. The waiter was polite, the atmosphere was generally cozy. We'll come back here sometime.

I've been going to this café for a week now, and I'm thrilled every time! 💒There's incredibly delicious avocado toast, eggs are perfectly cooked, and tea is just a find for a morning ritual. The atmosphere is cozy, the staff is friendly and the dishes are always fresh and beautifully served. 💔This place has become my favorite for breakfast. Thanks for the great service and delicious food!💕

We loved the breakfast so much, we came back the next morning! The atmosphere is incredibly charming, with a cozy vibe that makes you want to linger. The staff is so kind and welcoming, and the food is packed with a punch of vitamins that made us feel totally recharged. Highly recommend!

name: Skylight Nha Trang
address: 38 Tran Phu Street Rooftop, Nha Trang 650000 Vietnam
description: Don't miss out on the ultimate experience at Skylight Nha Trang! This breathtaking rooftop beach club, located on the 45th floor of the Havana Hotel in Vietnam, offers 360° views of the stunning beach town paradise and the best DJs in town to dance the night away underneath the stars. Open Thursday to Sunday from 20:00 to 01:00, come make unforgettable memories and capture those Instagram-worthy photos at Skylight Nha Trang. We look forward to welcoming you to our beach town paradise!
cuisines: Street Food Restaurants in Nha Trang
Fast Food Restaurants in Nha Trang
example_reviews: My visit to Skylight Rooftop in Nha Trang with my family was an exceptional experience. The ambiance, with its stunning panoramic views of the city and coastline, set the perfect backdrop for our evening out. The highlight of our meal was the Tomahawk steak. The meat was incredibly tender and cooked to perfection, offering a delightful blend of flavors that left us all thoroughly impressed. The presentation was equally impressive, making it a feast for both the eyes and the palate. The service was top-notch, with attentive and friendly staff who ensured our dining experience was seamless. They were especially accommodating to our family, making us feel welcome and well cared for. The overall atmosphere, combined with the quality of the food and service, makes Skylight a must-visit destination in Nha Trang. It's an ideal spot for families looking to enjoy a memorable meal with breathtaking views! Highly recommended for anyone visiting Nha Trang with their loved ones, especially if you are a meat lover.

Skylight Nha Trang is a vibrant rooftop bar and entertainment venue that offers a truly unforgettable experience. Perched atop the Premier Havana Hotel, it provides 360-degree panoramic views of Nha Trang's coastline, cityscape, and mountains, making it a perfect spot for sunset lovers and nightlife enthusiasts. The venue boasts a sleek and modern design, with multiple areas including a pool deck, a restaurant, and a lively dance floor featuring top-notch DJs. The drinks menu is diverse, offering creative cocktails and a solid selection of wines and spirits. The food menu features a mix of local Vietnamese flavors and international dishes, catering to a variety of tastes. The atmosphere is lively and sophisticated, drawing both tourists and locals. While the entry fee might seem steep to some, it typically includes a complimentary drink, and the overall experience justifies the cost. Whether you're looking to unwind with a cocktail, enjoy stunning views, or dance the night away, Skylight Nha Trang delivers.

Rooftop bar and restaurant at the Premier Havana Hotel. Paid entrance (includes one welcome drink), 360° view, attentive staff who will show you everything and guide you everywhere. I especially recommend a place with a glass floor. Come at sunset, the views and photos will be great!

name: &More by Sheraton
address: 26 - 28 Tran Phu Street Sheraton Nha Trang Hotel & Spa, Nha Trang 650000 Vietnam
description: & More is a vibrant and irresistible café-bakery during the morning and turns into a wine bar in the evening. The sweet aroma of freshly baked croissants and pastries, roasted coffee surrounds the minimalist open space and the terrace, while great vintages entertain guests throughout the afternoon and evening. & More is open from early morning until late evening. A rich breakfast is available offering a freshly baked selection of croissants, muffins and pastries, roasted Italian coffee and infusions. In the late afternoon, & More turns into a vibrant wine bar. Wines are served in attractive ice-bucket on the counter bar, paired with tasty snacks. The atmosphere is laid-back and cheerful. The outdoor terrace lounge sets the perfect mood for wine degustation.
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Nha Trang
Street Food Restaurants in Nha Trang
Spanish Restaurants for Lunch in Nha Trang
example_reviews: An ideal place to have breakfast and drink coffee with friends. Thao is cute and gives enthusiastic advice. Even though I went alone on a crowded day, I was still warmly welcomed by her. The breakfast combo is too high quality compared to the amount paid. Will come back and recommend to friends.

My family came from Da Nang to Nha Trang for a trip, and was introduced by friends to enjoy it. The shop has a wide variety of food and drinks, countless dishes. I found the food and drinks to be very delicious and also beautifully decorated. I ordered a lot of dishes. I was impressed that the fruit tea was very delicious and mouth-watering. Breakfast here sells super bargain combos, very delicious, compared to the price it's still cheap, because everything is of very good quality. Having delicious food and good service, the staff here serve attentively and care about customers, especially Anna who chatted and gave me many suggestions, but with the diverse menu, I was a bit confused :D . When you come to Nha Trang, you must definitely come here to enjoy it.

Landing the boat in Nha Trang, the boat comes back Coffee shop at Sheraton hotel, breakfast combo has many options and the price is not too bad. The coffee is very delicious and refreshing. Anna and her friends are very kind and loving. We will return.

name: Mắm Restaurant - Homestyle Vietnamese Flavors
address: 72 Nguyễn Thiện Thuật, Nha Trang 650000 Vietnam
description: Crafting an authentic Vietnamese experience with bamboo boats, terra-cotta, and artisanal homemeals – where design meets tradition.
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Nha Trang
Street Food Restaurants in Nha Trang
example_reviews: Food is delicious! We had the fried vegetarian spring rolls, vegetables with wok fried glass noodles, fruit icecream and soya bean curd with caramelised sauce. Great to get some nice vegetarian food. Plenty of seafood and meat for those who like it. The atmosphere is lovely and amazing indoor architecture. You can't go wrong 😀

A very atmospheric place not only with exquisite interior, service, but also cuisine. Starting from pleasant music, unobtrusive but gallant waiters, presentation of dishes and a beautiful and understandable menu with a large assortment. I definitely recommend it, even if you unexpectedly come across such a stylish and organic restaurant in such a resort town. Yes, the portions are not huge, but everything is sooooo tasty, the price tag is above average, but it’s worth it 1000 times.

It was a perfect dinner at Mam Restaurant. We tried a lot of delicious dishes here. Also, the staffs (especially ms. My Hao) were enthusiatic, they recommended many must-try dishes. We were impressed by the design as well as the warm atmosphere. If you are considering where to have dinner, you must try once at Mam restaurant, it won't let you down 💓💓💓

name: Kiwami
address: 114 Hồng Bàng, Nha Trang 652229 Vietnam
description: Kiwami is a new Japanese restaurant offering wonderful delicacies to the people of Nha Trang. Each dish incorporates the traditional preparation, style and flavors of Japanese cuisine.We look forward to greeting you and getting your feedback and support!
cuisines: Street Food Restaurants in Nha Trang
Fast Food Restaurants in Nha Trang
Middle Eastern Restaurants for Lunch in Nha Trang
example_reviews: I went there for lunch. The sushi platter, chawanmushi, miso soup and tempura sashimi set were fresh, the tempura was crispy and voluminous, and the value for money was excellent. I'd like to visit again during my stay in Nha Trang.

This restaurant is number 1 in the ranking of Japanese cuisine in Nha Trang, and I agree with that 100%. Nice atmosphere, polite staff, beautiful fresh cuisine!!! The serving of dishes is very appetizing, I recommend to a mandatory visit!!!

Kiwami is a great place for Japanese food, especially sushi. The fish is super fresh, and the dishes look and taste amazing. The restaurant feels cozy and nice, and the staff is friendly. It might be a bit expensive, but the quality makes it worth it if you love sushi

name: I Like Buffet
address: 61 Đặng Tất, Nha Trang 650000 Vietnam
description: The buffet was awesome. Everything on charcoal you could grill yourself at the table. The selection was incredibly varied and the staff totally nice and helpful and all for the equivalent of 8.80 € per person including beer or other drinks
cuisines: Street Food Restaurants in Nha Trang
Fast Food Restaurants in Nha Trang
French Restaurants for Breakfast in Nha Trang
Greek Restaurants for Lunch in Nha Trang
example_reviews: The buffet was awesome. Everything on charcoal you could grill yourself at the table. The selection was incredibly varied and the staff totally nice and helpful and all for the equivalent of 8.80 € per person including beer or other drinks

Natran's seafood barbecue seafood! You can eat a variety of fresh seafood, and every one of the Vietnamese foods was delicious! I was especially impressed by the employees carefully taking care of how to eat delicious seafood. While busy, the staff asked me if I needed help with a translator in Korean, so I could feel quality and sincerity. If you want to have an unforgettable meal at a affordable price in Natrang, this is the place to go. I like buffet, I love it!

Recently visited a Vietnamese buffet with friends and it was a wonderful experience! The atmosphere of the establishment is very cozy and friendly, which immediately creates a feeling of celebration. The variety of dishes is astonishing, from fresh seafood to fragrant salads to hot dishes. We tried a lot of different snacks, and each one was incredibly delicious and fresh. Service is also at the highest level – attentive waiters were always available to help, that. The desserts were particularly pleasing: light and sweet, they perfectly ended our evening. We had a great time laughing and enjoying the delicious food. Definitely recommend this buffet to anyone who wants to taste authentic Vietnamese cuisine and seafood in the company of friends!

name: Hispania Nha Trang
address: Bai Tien, Duong De, Vinh Hoa Ward Villa Le Corail, A Gran Melia Hotel, Ground Floor, Gran Voyage, Nha Trang 650000 Vietnam
description: LUXURY DINING WITH A SPANISH FLAIR Hispania redefines luxury dining with a harmonious blend of Spanish heritage and vibrant flavours. Led by Michelin-starred Spanish chef Marcos Morán, the menu features signature dishes from the acclaimed Hispania London and Brussels, while incorporating the local fresh seafood of Nha Trang. A truly immersive journey through Spain's most picturesque regions.
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Nha Trang
Street Food Restaurants in Nha Trang
Eastern European Restaurants for Lunch in Nha Trang
Romantic Fusion Restaurants in Nha Trang
example_reviews: If you’re looking for an authentic taste of Spain, this restaurant is a fantastic choice. The atmosphere is warm and inviting, with charming décor. The menu offers a great selection of traditional Spanish dishes, perfectly seasoned paella. The ingredients taste fresh, and the flavors are well-balanced, making every bite enjoyable. The service is also a highlight – Ms Tracy supervisor is friendly, knowledgeable, and always ready to recommend the best dishes and explained the ingredients very carefully. Overall, this is a must-visit spot for anyone who loves Spanish cuisine or wants to experience something new. Highly recommended!

I went there to commemorate the anniversary because I heard it was awarded 1 Michelin star. I really enjoy trying new foods and seek out a variety of flavors. The amuse bouche was delicious and all the food was good. In particular, the staff member in charge of us was very friendly and I felt really good. I think she said she was Choi and she said she was famous for the drama Queen of Tears haha. Thank you so much for even gifting us an anniversary dessert! It was a day like a gift❤️

We had the pleasure of dining twice at the Gran Melia Nha Trang's Hispania restaurant (Spanish restaurant). Once à la carte and once with the Chef's testing 5-course menu, and both were incredible experiences! Spanish cuisine has pride of place here, and every dish we tasted was a true delight. Featuring quality products, the authentic and delicate flavors really delighted our taste buds. A huge thank you to the Chef and his brigade, as well as to Ms Jasmin and Ms Trinh. Their service was impeccable, combining professionalism with human warmth. They took the time to explain each dish to us, which enriched our experience. The ambience of the restaurant is equally charming, creating an ideal setting for a memorable meal. We particularly appreciated the attention to detail, both in the presentation of the dishes and in the warm welcome. In short, L'Hispania is a must for those wishing to enjoy authentic Spanish cuisine in a welcoming setting. We'd like to thank the whole team for a fantastic evening, and look forward to coming back for more! Comte G&M

name: Phở Tình Nha Trang
address: 64c Nguyễn Thị Minh Khai Tân Lập, Nha Trang 57100 Vietnam
description: Pho Tinh Nha Trang is proud to bring the traditional Hanoi pho flavor, famous for its rich, delicious broth simmered from marrow bones for many hours. Combined with tender, sweet beef slices and delicious, chewy pho noodles, each bowl of pho here is a perfect blend of Vietnamese culinary quintessence. The restaurant is located at 64C Nguyen Thi Minh Khai, right in the center of Nha Trang, very convenient for both locals and tourists. We serve from 6am to 9pm, ideal for early breakfast, intimate lunch or relaxing dinner with family and friends. The restaurant space is designed to be spacious, clean, equipped with modern air conditioning to bring maximum comfort to diners. The friendly, professional staff is always ready to serve and bring a great culinary experience. Visit Pho Tinh Nha Trang to feel the authentic traditional pho flavor and enjoy a cozy, intimate Vietnamese culinary space!
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Nha Trang
Street Food Restaurants in Nha Trang
French Restaurants for Lunch in Nha Trang
Indian Restaurants for Lunch in Nha Trang
example_reviews: Clean and excellent service. The phở isn’t quite the same as the ironical one in Hanoi as it has less green onion but I guess that’s just adjusting to the local taste bud. Still recommended if you’re looking for a taste of Hanoi Phở Thìn
Clean atmosphere. Great Korean. Second visit. I came to remember Korean food. Same as when we arrived in November. The Big Swan.
There's a special menu so I think it'd be nice to visit a band tired of other rice beans! The steak and rice are delicious :)

name: Secrets Bar & Grill Nha Trang
address: 64 Hong Bang, Nha Trang 650000 Vietnam
description: Canadian owned and operated...Steaks, burgers & more... Great Cocktails serving in bottom floor bar...cozy dining room, amazing chilled out patio.. and vip private room for dinner functions. Warm and friendly staff ready serve you. Thanks All and See you!
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Nha Trang
Street Food Restaurants in Nha Trang
Late Night European Restaurants in Nha Trang
French Restaurants for Breakfast in Nha Trang
Greek Restaurants for Lunch in Nha Trang
example_reviews: Really glad i found this joint in nha trang. Food was excellent, our server (i think his name was Tho?) was exceptional, very patient and knowledgeable, servers even went above ans beyond in buying us flowers on request because we didnt know the area well! Bar staff gave us complementary drinks on the house as well! Owners are from Canada and xan speak english and vietnamese fluently and are very friendly and easy going. Steaks were delicious along with the mussles and clams we had as sides. Highly recommend visiting and experiencing this place, it feels like a five star western restaurant with Nha Trang prices and warm asian welcoming vibes.

After weeks of delicious Vietnamese food, that craving for Western comfort started creeping in. Lucky for us, our friend Brandon introduced us to Secrets Bar & Grill, a steakhouse gem in Nha Trang owned by chef Gerry Nguyen. Tucked near the beach and city center, this place is as inviting as it is impressive—elegant decor, cozy indoor and breezy outdoor seating, plus a full bar with a solid wine list. Gerry sources top-quality meats straight from Australia and Canada, and it shows. We kicked things off with a perfectly shaken margarita and a frozen Bellini—both were spot on. Then came the starters: a classic Caesar salad with anchovies and rich French onion soup. But the star? That ribeye. Cooked to absolute perfection. Secrets Bar & Grill is known for its premium imported steaks, curated wine selection, and relaxed, upscale vibe. Whether you’re celebrating or just need a break from noodles, this is the spot. The secret’s officially out—if you’re in Nha Trang, do yourself a favor and check it out. You won’t be disappointed.

This place is a bit expensive compared to Vietnamese prices, but the quality of the food is good enough for the price. Usually, about 300 grams per adult is enough, so I don't know the exact name of the amount and drink, but I ordered two cocktails and ate them with my wife. I went there together, and the restaurant has a nice atmosphere and the staff's English level is excellent and friendly. I'm planning to visit Nha Trang again on May 3 for a 5-day, 4-night trip, and I'm planning to visit for dinner. However, the only thing that's disappointing is that the menu doesn't mention food and cocktails. I think I can get more help with ordering if there is a picture with it.

name: Mix Greek Restaurant
address: 181 Nguyen Thien Thuat, Nha Trang 650000 Vietnam
description:
We decided to give this restaurant a try on our trip to Nha Trang  as Greece is literally our 2nd home. And boy we were not disappointed. Met by the owner, Stefanos, we were shown to a beautiful table by the window that gave a great view of the street. Our first impression of the restaurant was how like the many Greek Tavernas we have tried that this place actually was, with original Greek colors and wall art.

We chose the local house wine and excitedly perused the extensive menu. Missing all the fresh fish we eat in Greece we asked Stef if we could try a Fish Platter. Excellent choice! (please see pic below and arrive hungry!) As it was going to be all cooked from fresh we were told to expect a wait of at least 35 minutes. Not a problem, just keep the excellent house red topped up in our glasses! 

And then it arrived! Wow! It was nearly the length of the table! So on the huge platter there were Clams, Mussels Saganaki, Calamari’s, a whole Seabass, Bassa portions accompanied by a bowl of fries, fresh salad adorning each end of the plate, a selection of dips and bread too. So we set to work! Demolishing everything we could see! It was a work in progress in between the wine. Even the owner was surprised we finished it!

With this gone we thought we could not manage another morsel! Quickly changed our minds though when we were presented with little chocolate pots to finish off!

All in all it was an excellent start to our trip to Nha Trang with excellent food and service which is second to none that we have experienced and will definitely visit again before we leave.

Thank you Steve, Makis and the team you certainly deliver 100% in all aspects!

Jo and Mart x

I physically cannot explain how good this place is. The best food we’ve had in a long time- and you get a free dessert just because! Everything tastes extremely fresh, the staff strive for perfection and the setting really feels like you’re in Greece. After 6 weeks of backpacking, this place cured my soul. Please go here!

We discovered this restaurant in 2015 and rediscovered it at its new location 9 years later. Food is still fabulous and great value. The portions are generous and the Britzola (pork steak) was enough between two adults. The meat was very flavoursome. We also had a starter of fried saganaki which was very creamy and moreish. Finally, a complimentary dessert – a chocolate brownie type pudding with banana. We highly recommend this restaurant.

name: Sailing Club Nha Trang
address: 72-74 Tran Phu, Loc Tho, Nha Trang 570000 Vietnam
description: Part of the unique charm of the Nha Trang Sailing Club is its ability to transform itself depending on the hour of the day. From sun-up until sun-down it is the perfect beach club and is available for all to enjoy. If you are looking for a place to while away a few hours whilst soaking up an amazing beach and island view then look no further. A delectable cocktail or delicious snack is only a wave of the hand away. As the sun disappears behind Nha Trang's beautiful hills, the Sailing Club transforms into a sophisticated dining setting serving eclectic food from four different international kitchens. Whatever your taste may be, we believe we have the dish for you! And just when you thought it was time to go home, the Nha Trang Sailing Club once again reinvents itself as restaurant becomes bar and night club. Every night of the year, the Nha Trang Sailing Club offers the best dance floor and the latest tunes on offer in the city.
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Nha Trang
Street Food Restaurants in Nha Trang
Indian Restaurants for Lunch in Nha Trang
example_reviews: Excellent location right on the beach and has seating on the sand, patio or inside. Has an equally vast choice of cuisines and drinks. We had a bespoke, vegetarian pizza made and it was absolutely delicious. Thin, crispy with a perfect balance of toppings and cheese. As it was early evening, the music being played by the DJ was appropriate to enjoy the meal whilst enjoying the sound of the sea and breeze. Though not the cheapest beachside bar/restaurant, it has the perfect ambience to unwind and enjoy Nha Trang by nite. Would definitely come again.

Ideally located , easily accessible and the perfect beach setting. We were there in the evening for a bite and saw the colors change …. Beaches of Nha Trang all brilliant hues. Found the menu very interesting, the passion fruit cocktail i ordered was refreshing.Samosa was mind blowing with the accompanying mint chutney.Prices are also moderate however it’s well worth it for the eclectic vibe!!! Service was top notch and also rather quick. There were milkshakes, lavish fruit platters and endless beers being served. Great place for people watching as jogger’s go by in the evening and one can see the ferris wheel lit up at Vinwonder. Drop by to hang out and chill!!!

We stopped after a day at the beach to have a beer. Excellent service. It has tables on the beach and the place is right in front of the sea. It also offers restaurant service with dishes from all over the world: from local, Indian, Italian... prices above the local average.

name: Johnny Steak House
description:
First please note that this review applies to the Johnny Steak House nr 2 (same owners) at Đối diện nhà hàng Ngọc Trai, Số mới, 66, 126 Nguyễn Thị Minh Khai, Nha Trang, Khánh Hòa 650000, Vietnam

AMAZED beyond reason maybe (🤔) but Johnny Steak House nr 2 in Nha Trang keeps impressing me more and more after about 4 or 5 dinners I had there over the course of the last 3 weeks.

First the service: the best I have come across in restaurants in Vietnam until now. By far. Highly professional. Impeccable. So discrete and quiet, super efficient and attentive, very customer friendly and respectful. Excellent team coordination & spirit. No time spent on cell phones. No talking, no chat among staff, only a permanent attention on customers. Orders & (special) requests from customers executed and delivered in an impeccable manner. Nothing left to desire. Truly impressive.

Second the quality of the food I ordered (as a diabetic person I go systematically for the "simple" top blade steaks) was consistently very good to simply excellent like on my latest visit which impressed me most this evening, Dec. 13  (reason why I am posting this review on TA 😉💜). 

Though I find the free side to be on the light size of the things (I wish there would be more, yes for sure 😂 especially since it is soooo good) everything is very nicely presented and the meat always exactly cooked as ordered (as it should but in that restaurant it is highly consistent). 

As local customs might differ from expectations based on experiences at home, I learned that being very specific about what I expect when ordering is ensuring that I will not get disappointed or feel a bit of frustration, at least in that wonderful restaurant, as they will accommodate every special request. First class service at no additional cost and admirable experience every time.

So I ask for the sauce of the Cesar salad to be served on the side. More recently I came to realize that I could simply ask for lemon or vinegar and use salt, pepper and oil on the table for a healthier dressing (as I suffer from diabetes).

Also I specify to be served the meat only once I am done with the salad 😉 as well as to get every single item on the main plate warm... not cold or luke warm. I even request the plate to be (hot)warm as I am a very slow eater (yes in the end it will get cold but... I can/have to live with that😅).

This is definitely my top restaurant in Nha Trang and the wonderful owner & admirable team combined with delicious food and an amazing customer service minded attitude is the reason. I would eat there every single day probably ... though that would not be a wise and healthy choice. I wish the same exceptional first class service and great food & price would be the norm in Nha Trang... and elsewhere 🙏🏻🙏🏻🙏🏻❤️

Johnny Steak House is our go-to choice. Exceptional quality of steaks, combined with impeccable service and sophisticated atmosphere We enjoyed the Ribeye Steak, cooked to perfect medium. The meat is tender and juicy, the staff is very enthusiastic, they introduced and gave very detailed prices, really worth it

Johnny Steak House is an exceptional dining experience! The atmosphere is cozy and inviting, making it perfect for a relaxing meal. The staff are extremely friendly and attentive, ensuring every detail is taken care of. The steaks are cooked to perfection and the overall atmosphere makes you feel right at home. Highly recommended

name: Ambassador Club Nha Trang
address: Ana Marina, Nguyễn Cơ Thạch Bến thuyền Ana Marina, Nha Trang 650000 Vietnam
description: I had a nice breakfast and drinks at The Yacht. There are many breakfasts here, such as Hue beef noodles, Nha Trang soup ... More importantly, there is a decaf food. At The Yacht restaurant, there are not only a variety of dishes, but also beautiful drinks to make drinkers feel delicious, such as: sunset tea, cardamom flower tea... and more importantly, the yacht has great staff and has fun. Thank you for a great breakfast.

At The Yacht restaurant, there are not only a variety of dishes, but also beautiful drinks to make drinkers feel delicious, such as: sunset tea, cardamom flower tea... and more importantly, the yacht has great staff and has fun. Thank you for a great breakfast.

I don't know how to put it, I came here with my friend, if you love a fun and bustling place ❤️❤️ I suggest Ambassador Club to you, here you will have a perfect experience from taste to hearing and sight. Although it is called a buffet, each area will have its own waiter and I was served by Thang 🥹🥹 , who helped me have a great experience dinner here. He took care of us wholeheartedly from the greeting to leaving, even though there were other tables. Very commendable for Thang. Thank you very much, Thang. I will definitely come back here on the nearest day and I will still choose Thang as my waiter. See you soon 🙆🏻‍♀️

I came for a package trip with my family and the rabbit was delicious and the buffet was so delicious!! And the staff are all friendly. Nice to visit with family!! And it was great that Logan Logan, a male employee, was able to make a cocktail with a great performance.

name: Ăn Thôi
address: 03 Ng. Đức Kế, Nha Trang 650000 Vietnam
description: Ăn Thôi Nha Trang - The Perfect Stop for a Full Dining Experience Located at 03 Ngo Duc Ke, right in the heart of Nha Trang, Ăn Thôi Nha Trang brings together authentic Vietnamese dishes, from beef pho and bun cha to fresh seafood delights. Every dish is crafted with high-quality ingredients, delivering flavors that are hard to find elsewhere. The restaurant offers a spacious and modern space, perfect for enjoying meals with family and friends. Our friendly and attentive staff are always ready to ensure a relaxing and enjoyable dining experience. We are open daily from 10:30 AM to 10:00 PM. Whether it's a quick lunch, a cozy dinner, or a special date, Ăn Thôi Nha Trang is the ideal choice for a culinary experience that will make you want to come back for more. Visit us and feel the difference!
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Nha Trang
Street Food Restaurants in Nha Trang
Spanish Restaurants for Lunch in Nha Trang
example_reviews: We entered the establishment because there was a queue to enter. Great food, fast and attentive waiters, drinks a little expensive, but beer in a mug from the freezer covers the overprice. We took rice with seafood in pineapple, very tasty! A must visit

Ăn Thôi – A Delicious Surprise in Nha Trang It’s been a long time since we came back to visit Nha Trang. The city has changed quite a bit, and when we asked friends for food recommendations, one name came up: Ăn Thôi. As Vietnamese, we’re used to the traditional look, feel, and taste of our dishes, so we were a little skeptical when we noticed most of the customers were non-Vietnamese tourists. But we gave it a shot—and we’re glad we did. The restaurant is warmly lit with tasteful decor, creating a cozy but not overly quiet vibe. It strikes that nice balance between lively and laid-back. We went all in and ordered a bunch of traditional dishes to put them to the test: • Crispy baby shrimp with lime leaf: A nostalgic hit! It brought back memories from childhood. The lime leaf gave it a fresh, aromatic lift. • Mi Quang (Quang noodles): Spot on. The flavors were authentic and true to the central Vietnamese style we love. Bonus points: they include a little leaflet showing tourists how to eat it properly—Vietnamese-style. Very thoughtful. • Ăn Thôi morning glory: A touch spicy for my taste, but still very flavorful. No wonder it’s a hit with their Korean customers. • Lemongrass pork skewers: Perfectly portioned and prepped with all the ingredients chopped and ready to roll, literally. Just follow the guide and you’re set. We definitely over-ordered for two people—but we didn’t regret a bite. Too often, modern Vietnamese restaurants tone down the flavor to appeal to a broader crowd and end up losing the soul of the dish. Ăn Thôi manages to walk the line beautifully—you get authenticity and approachability in one place. If you’re ever in Nha Trang and craving real Vietnamese food that doesn’t compromise on taste, Ăn Thôi is worth a visit. You won’t be disappointed.

I've come for lunch. Well, yesterday I delivered it to you at the Schlanritz, and it's delicious, so today I've come to eat it myself. Yesterday I ate meat and morningglory fries, so today I've come to eat beef rice and garlic morningglory fries.

name: Dinner at Cim’s
address: Tran Phu, Hem 86B / Villa No. 30 Loc Tho, Nha Trang 650000 Vietnam
description: Welcome to family Krantz! Home style cooking in our vintage style private villa. Excellent steaks, a refined wine list and resonable prices. Your choice between the dining room, the patio or the garden. Our place is small so we recommend you to book a table.

Street Food Restaurants in Nha Trang
French Restaurants for Lunch in Nha Trang
example_reviews: Best independent restaurant in Nha Trang. Trip Advisor reviews of Dinner at Cims were excellent and so we thought we would give it a go. We arrived early before 6.00pm and were delighted to see this very comfortable restaurant in a quiet back street in Nha Trang. We selected the set menu for couples and quickly discovered the food was amazing. Fresh bread, Scandinavian Prawns on toast, French onion soup, spaghetti carbonara, then tenderloin steak finishing with apple pie and home made ice cream. At around $50 AUD a head it was certainly worth it. Would highly recommend Dinner at Cims as a must do in Nha Trang.

The dinner was 10/10!!! For the starters we ordered a tiger prawns and beef tartar - 10/10 the tartar was one of the best I’ve ever tried before. For the main course we ordered the steak platter - 10/10, the beef was so fresh and soft. We have visited a lot of top places here in Nha Trang, this is the must visit place!

Just remembered out of the blue the Steak House in Nha Trang from TA, DMed at the google map for booking(had no idea it did work, yeh it did), came the spot earlier than booking time, which was a nice choice as the Alley to the restaurant was so curtained and not seen by the big big shops around on the main blvd. Kind English speaking Staffs who recommended today's BlackAngus Tenderion and Tigar, the sweet cat, which came for the rich butter-flavored shrimps. Every experience was quite, peaceful and good to be there.

name: Ivegan Supershop - Nha Trang
address: 92/20 Hung Vuong Lộc Thọ, Nha Trang 650000 Vietnam
description: iVegan is a hidden gem in Nha Trang! The food is packed with flavor, fresh, and entirely plant-based. With a diverse menu ranging from hearty meals to tasty desserts, there's something for everyone. The cozy ambiance and welcoming staff make it a must-visit for anyone seeking a great vegan experience. Highly recommend!"
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Nha Trang
Street Food Restaurants in Nha Trang
Late Night BBQ Restaurants in Nha Trang
example_reviews: iVegan is a hidden gem in Nha Trang! The food is packed with flavor, fresh, and entirely plant-based. With a diverse menu ranging from hearty meals to tasty desserts, there's something for everyone. The cozy ambiance and welcoming staff make it a must-visit for anyone seeking a great vegan experience. Highly recommend!"

I really like iVegan because (other than just being really tasty international vegan food) they put the kcal and macros on the menus so you can make a choice based on that. My fav in terms of taste: beyond meat burger. My fav in terms of macros: tofu scramble :) It might be slightly more expensive for the local market, but the prices are still 20-25% of what you'd have to pay in the West. PS: if you leave a review, you can get ANYTHING from the coffee and deserts menu. That's very generous!

After travelling Vietnam for a month this was exactly what I needed, been feeling a bit homesick with food and haven’t been eating very healthy food out of convenience. This has made me feel so refreshed and happy, the portions are super generous and the juice press and coffee is stunning. Recommend this to anyone who’s after some greens!

name: Ơi Nha Trang Restaurant
address: 11 Yersin, Nha Trang 65000 Vietnam
description:
Đặt tiệc sinh nhật ngay để được trang trí gói tiêu chuẩn miễn phí và giảm giá 10% trên tổng hóa đơn.
Đặt bàn gọi: 0903669969
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Nha Trang
Street Food Restaurants in Nha Trang
example_reviews: Very tasty food and big portions, grilled dishes are delicious, and much tea for the whole party. Prices are reasonable! We tried grilled goose, squid and chicken curry - perfect!

Oh my, we came back again because the food and the staff were so amazing. Our darling server helped us Canadians dish up our food - Bun Bo hue, because we were rookies. The manager owner? also recognized us and was so grateful for our return business. We had the grilled fish platter with fab salad 1 night, green curry with shrimp and morning glory with garlic. It is one of my most favourite restaurants after a month in Vietnam. Cam on.

Stumbled across this bistro and decided to give it a try. We were welcomed like family and the service was outstanding. Koi (sorry if it is spelled wrong!) was an outstanding host and our table server (sorry that we didn't get her name) was friendly and attentive. The food was incredibly tasty and really affordable. I can highly recommend the pork skewers. If you are in the area it is definitely worth a visit!!

name: La Cala
address: 172/16A Bach Dang, Nha Trang 650000 Vietnam
description: An authentic Italian restaurant run by two Italians who have been missing real Italian food in Nha Trang for too long. We serve hand made pastas, long-leavening Neapolitan pizza cooked in traditional wood fired oven and a wide selection of Italian wines in a pleasant and warm environment to make you feel like you are enjoying your time in Italy on a Mediterranean Island.
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Nha Trang
Street Food Restaurants in Nha Trang
Spanish Restaurants for Lunch in Nha Trang
review_summary:
La Cala has charmed many diners with its inviting atmosphere, which guests liken to a European seaside escape or a snug local haunt. The establishment's authentic Italian fare, particularly the wood-fired pizzas and homemade pasta, garners high praise for its quality, although a handful of patrons have noted inconsistencies in some dishes.

The service at La Cala generally receives accolades for its attentiveness and friendliness, with complimentary offerings often mentioned as a delightful bonus. While most reviews suggest the restaurant offers good value, reflecting generous portions and reasonable pricing, there are occasional remarks about service hiccups.
example_reviews: After reading reviews we decided last minute to go here, to find it was very busy. Not expecting a table we still asked and after a few minutes wait were accommodated by the proactive front of house manager upstairs in this overall well fitted out dining space. The waitress Nuc? Was very attentive and engaging and made our night even more enjoyable. The food however was really authentic Italian more so than expected. Wood fired pizza, sensational, the home made pasta, next level and a good choice of imported wines and choice of great desserts. Try the tiramisu! A great spot, highly recommend!!

Words cannot describe the service at this place! Three young servers who had the biggest smiles on their faces, from the time we arrived until we left ☺️ The food was amazing and reasonably priced! The chef also came out and wished us a tasty meal. Love 🌟

The pizza dough here is one of the best I’ve eaten anywhere in the world … rosemary May be the secret ingredient. The staff are wonderfully attentive and not afraid to advise about food portions (they are BIG) in order that you don’t over order. This was matched - so says the husband - by a 9/10 tiramisu. Tucked along a lane away from the evening business that is Nha Trang, come too La Cala and you may as well be in Italy.

name: Happy Noodles Soup
address: 19 Ngo Gia Tu Tan Lap, Nha Trang 650000 Vietnam
description: Happiness brought to a good meal! There is a dish that is not delicacy of Vietnam but it’s number 1 at the top 40 delicious dishes in the world . It’s PHO (NOODLE SOUP) – the familiar, rustic dish and full of Vietnamese spirit. Our chef grinds flour, coats and slices rice noodles at the counter , fresh ingredients and sweet, tasty broth according to traditional recipes blending with hot brisket and shank which is put in stone bowls. All the flavors in the bowl of Pho mingle together, tasting a small spoon you will feel the harmony in each flavor. The freshness of the meat, the chewy rice noodles , the aroma of vegetables, the spiciness of chilies and a little sourness of lemons. They are the quintessence and cooking secret to make a smell bowl of noodle soup.We engage to serve wholeheartedly, sincerely and extremely proud to be with you to experience great flavors !HANH PHUC (HAPPY) NOODLES SOUP – EATING IS HAPPY
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Nha Trang
Street Food Restaurants in Nha Trang
Spanish Restaurants for Lunch in Nha Trang
example_reviews: Noodle bomb!!! A cafe with a mono menu of noodles and rolls with meat and vegetables! Served quickly, everything is fresh. The noodles are made from the same place by hand, as you can see. Clean for a street cafe. Came based on reviews, I recommend it. We took fobo and rolls, if you want meat, take the more expensive one in a clay cup, there is raw meat there. We had lunch: 2 fobos and 2 rolls and 2 Saigon and Orange beers for 340 thousand ($14).

The noodles were delicious. The menu was easy to understand, with English explanations and pictures. Many people ordered hot stone pho, which is raw beef heated to your liking, but I ordered regular beef pho. I saw a local woman adding lots of bean sprouts and herbs and lots of seasonings, so I did the same and it was delicious. It has a mild taste without adding anything.

had lunch here when i visited nha trang two weeks ago.someone recommended this pho restaurant to me.it is popular among tourists,especially among korean tourists. there is a speciality dish for Korean in the menu,that is called pho in the stone bowl (pho tho da). stone bowls widely used in Korean restaurants. it is my first time to have pho in stone bowl,very unique experience.besides,i ordered orange juice and Quẩy. (fried dough sticks), i always love to put Quẩy inside the bowl,it will become more delicious. pho soup here is not heavy, pho itself is tasty.after the meal, you will become hạnh phúc, which means happy in English,or 행복해 in Korean.worth a visit!

name: Atlas Café
address: 17A Cao Văn Bé, Nha Trang Vietnam
description: Coffee & Restaurant with scandinavian style
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Nha Trang
Street Food Restaurants in Nha Trang
Middle Eastern Restaurants for Lunch in Nha Trang
Romantic Seafood Restaurants in Nha Trang
example_reviews: The food is stunning. We both had the Atlas salad with Mexican shrimp, avocado, green dressing and more. It was so good that we came again the day after. Then we had Salmon croissant and green pesto shrimp pasta. Again lovely food. The only thing I could criticise is that the portions could be a bit bigger, but is is still worth the price. The dishes vary from around 70.000 to 300.000, and a few more expensive seafood dished. Average dish is about 125.000. The cafe has a cosy ambiance which is a nice break from the city. Classical music is played and the seats are comfortable yet stylish. Would recommend 10/10.

During our 1week stay in Nha Trang we visited multiple brunch places and Atlas by far stood out from all of them ! There is a decent selection of both savory and sweet dishes and all the food a very flavour full and fresh ! The staff were very friendly and attentive and I would recommend anyone looking for European western brunch in Nha Trang, Atlas Cafe.

A great place for a pleasant time. Here you will find a magnificent cuisine, where each dish is prepared with love and attention to detail. The atmosphere of the establishment charms with its coziness, while cleanliness and order create a comfortable environment. The staff is friendly and attentive, always ready to help and delight guests. I recommend visiting Atlas Cafe - you will definitely be satisfied!

name: Grill Garden 1
address: 21 Biet Thu Street, Nha Trang Vietnam
description: Grill Garden- is more, than just a restaurant serving national Vietnamese cuisine! Grill Garden- is a place, where you have an opportunity to experience a real culinary adventure! To taste such delicacies as crocodile, ostrich, snake, oysters, and to participate in their preparation, right on your table!
cuisines: Street Food Restaurants in Nha Trang
Fast Food Restaurants in Nha Trang
example_reviews: If you want to eat oysters, mussels and shrimp to the ground, here you go. It's delicious here (shrimp must be boiled ourselves). Everything else can be tried to make sure it's not worth eating. I also do not recommend taking lobster for an additional fee.

We went purely for the different types of meat to try so we don't regret our visit, however it is pick up raw meat and cook it yourself at the table. It's a nice idea but not when we're paying more than usual for the lack of service. We had to ask for my husband's drink 3 times before it finally arrived. The food itself was nice but we did need to cook it ourselves, and we got to try some new things (crocodile, snake and frog). They also didn't serve ice tea which seemed unusual! There are similar restaurants in the area which are cheaper and include a drink, but we haven't tried them to be able to compare

Ate here this evening with my partner. Walked passed once and noticed it was very busy. We went back and were seated right away. Staff were very friendly. We had no issues with the service like some other reviews mentioned. Our server was very helpful and helped us cook some meats/ fish we hadn't tried before etc. Can't really comment on the quality of the fish as we're not big fish eaters. It was however a good chance for us to try a few new things. Was overall a pleasent evening. Beers were 20vnd which was also very good.

name: Strawy Restaurant
address: 38 Nguyen Dinh Chieu Bamboo Village Beach Resort & Spa, Ham Tien, Phan Thiet 800000 Vietnam
description: Strawy Restaurant is located in Bamboo Village Beach Resort & Spa and boasts a beachfront location, exquisite Vietnamese and international cuisines, and impeccable service. The East Cape Bar offers splendid views of the lagoon and a favorite spot for guests to enjoy sunset cocktails.
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Ham Tien
Street Food Restaurants in Ham Tien
Vietnamese Restaurants for Large Groups in Ham Tien
Seafood Restaurants for Lunch in Ham Tien
example_reviews: We spent 14 days at the Bamboo Village Resort, which includes the restaurant, where we regularly had breakfast and ate a la carte. Breakfast is very rich and also offers a variety of hot dishes. The food is themed on several menus, Asian, Western and Italian, on several nights there is BBQ with live music and an additional BBQ menu. All the dishes were perfectly tasted, we could taste some and rarely ate so well. Our focus was on seafood, especially the shrimp in Tamarind sauce had pleased me, but also the smaller dishes for lunch like spaghetti bolognese or sometimes a burger were very delicious. The service was extremely friendly and attentive, Tuan the supervisor always inquired if everything was fine. Our European stomach tolerated all food well, there were never any problems in this regard. Everything was really very clean. And also the cocktails were excellent:-)

The chef’s cooking was delightful pairing with the other foods in the buffet section. Desserts were always so delicious following up with the fresh fruits lined up. I was always happy to be walking around excited to see what will be served for the day. As well as drinks paired with everything was delectable. For my sister's 18th birthday we were able to ask the receptionist to order roses and a cake. They were very kind, the manager went as far as to give us a discount on the cake due to them not being able to lower the flowers price. They went as far as to have a heart banner with balloons surrounding it saying “Happy Birthday”. I’m incredibly pleased with the amazing food and service they have provided us with each meal.

The food was super delicious, especially the fish and the curry. The staff are very nice and attentive. The restaurant is located directly on the beach, a BBQ was also offered. The breakfast buffet is also very delicious, a large selection, also of hot food and a great fruit selection (changing daily).

name: Good Morning Vietnam Italian Restaurant Pizzeria
address: 57A Nguyen Dinh Chieu Ham Tien, Mui Ne, Phan Thiet Vietnam
description: Located at the center of Mui Ne, Good Morning Vietnam is an authentic Italian restaurant that offers a wide range of superior quality foods at reasonable prices. The natural decor, the well spaced tables and chairs, the pleasant atmosphere and an extensive menu make the restaurant a treat. The restaurant specializes in pizza made fresh from wood fired oven, pasta home made and classic, home made Italian desserts, ice cream and Italian coffee. The menu varies from imported meats to local seafoods and fish. In addition, a good selection of imported red and white wines exquisitely complements the menu. It opens everyday from morning to late evening, free delivery is available.
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Mui Ne
Italian Restaurants for Lunch in Mui Ne
example_reviews: We made an exception, and for one night, we skipped the local restaurants. We were really satisfied with this Italian. You can tell that there has been a lot of work to offer a genuine experience, both when it comes to the food and the hospitality of the friendly staff. We tried some different dishes and found out that the pasta is actually home made and also the pizzas are of really good quality, with that genuine Italian crust and flavor. A tiramisu that pleased our son and a good espresso to finish it all off. An extra star to the staff that, during the whole dinner, looked after us and made sure that we were satisfied! The prices are of course a bit higher than the local food, but very reasonable especially if you consider the quality of the whole experience. The complimentary limoncello before we left added an extra bonus! Try this place!
Great place with Italian cuisine! Children liked the pasta, now they ask for it always for dinner)))) Delicious poured beer, but more expensive than the local Saigon. Also liked Risotto with seafood

We have been super well served with very tasty dishes: good to be able to eat real Italian food in Vietnam. By the way, with very nice Sicilian wine... Staff sooooo friendly and accommodating... The word pampering was invented for this!👍😉

name: Poke Mui Ne
address: 85 Nguyễn Đình Chiểu, Phan Thiet 80000 Vietnam
description: Poke and smoothie bowls in Mui Ne. Fresh and healthy food. The best food for you. We also have coffee, juices, ice tea. You can come visit us or order free delivery.
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Phan Thiet
Street Food Restaurants in Phan Thiet
French Restaurants for Breakfast in Phan Thiet
example_reviews: POKE Mui Ne cafe was a super find. 💙Beyond their soothing properties, the pastel colours evoked feelings of joy and happiness. Light, airy and a great choice in music brought calming and peaceful vibes. Diabetic, the high quality poke bowls were healthy and super tasty. Fresh seafood, salad, vegetable and protein ingredients plentiful. 👍🏻 A variety of smoothie bowls, milkshakes, ice cream and drinks were available too. The lady who works here was extremely pleasant, friendly and helpful. Highly recommend a visit here for a tasty, healthy meal and drink in a great atmosphere!! 🌸 PS. Their cycle hire was a great option. #foodismymood #eatgoodfeelgood

5 out of 5 What a nice, clean, pleasant place with delicious and beautiful food! I had a poke with my own selection of ingredients, and it was fabulous. Nice view out of window also and nice lady working at the kitchen. So much recommended 💛

Eat two pokes, I'll give you a grade-- food average. It's a bit dry, not enough sauce and tenderness! The main product of salmon and tuna was not enough! You can eat once! The atmosphere is cool, a very unusual place for Vietnam!

name: Vista Restaurant
address: Zone 5, Phu Hai Ward The Cliff Resort & Residences, Mui Ne, Phan Thiet 80000 Vietnam
description: The Vista restaurant has a spectacular ocean view, open space or air conditioned. It opens 24/7 and serving breakfast, lunch and dinner. The restaurant specialized in fresh local seafood, Western and Asian food while the bar serves beer, fine wines and cocktails. It is located right in the heart of Mui Ne at The Cliff resort & Residences.
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Mui Ne
example_reviews: This place has a relaxed and cozy atmosphere, making it the perfect spot to unwind after a long day. The food is not only delicious but also beautifully presented, with a wide variety of dishes to choose from. Whether you’re in the mood for something light or a hearty meal, there’s always something to satisfy your cravings. The waiters here are not only cute but also incredibly kind and attentive, ensuring that every customer has a pleasant dining experience. Their friendly smiles and excellent service make you feel truly welcomed. Overall, it’s a great place to enjoy good food and great restaurants

If you’re looking for a breakfast experience that combines freshness, quality, and variety, Vista Restaurant is the perfect spot. The food is freshly prepared right in front of you by skilled chefs, ensuring both flavor and a sense of craftsmanship in every dish. The selection is impressive, catering to different tastes and dietary preferences. From a variety of freshly baked breads and pastries to an abundant spread of fruits, cold cuts, and cheeses, there’s something for everyone. The hot dishes are equally delightful, offering classic breakfast staples alongside more creative options. Whether you prefer a light and healthy start to your day or a more indulgent meal, Vista has you covered. The atmosphere is welcoming, and the attention to detail in both service and presentation enhances the overall experience. Whether you’re a guest at the hotel or simply stopping by for breakfast, Vista is a fantastic choice that sets the tone for a great day ahead.

Dine with a View at Vista Restaurant, Phan Thiet Vista Restaurant in Phan Thiet isn't just a place to grab a bite, it's an experience for all senses. Here's why you should add it to your Phan Thiet itinerary: Stunning Oceanfront Setting: The restaurant's open design places you right in the heart of the beachfront scenery. Imagine gentle breezes carrying the scent of the ocean as you gaze out at the seemingly endless horizon. It's the perfect spot for a romantic dinner or a memorable family gathering. Culinary Delights: Vista Restaurant doesn't disappoint when it comes to food. They offer a delicious selection, possibly featuring local specialties of Phan Thiet alongside other culinary creations. The reviews mention the care and detail put into each dish, making for a truly delightful dining experience. Relaxing Ambiance: Vista Restaurant boasts a sophisticated yet warm atmosphere. Whether you're celebrating a special occasion or simply seeking a peaceful escape, the ambiance allows you to unwind and savor the moment. Excellent Service: Based on positive reviews, Vista Restaurant appears to have attentive staff who ensure your dining experience is enjoyable. Prime Location: Situated within The Cliff Resort & Residences, Vista Restaurant is likely easily accessible, especially if you're staying nearby. Overall: Vista Restaurant offers a delightful combination of breathtaking ocean views, delicious food, and a relaxing atmosphere. With its attentive service and prime location, it's a restaurant that deserves a visit during your stay in Phan Thiet. Tips: Check if reservations are recommended, especially during peak season. Inquire about their menu offerings beforehand, especially if you have dietary restrictions. Since it's an open-air restaurant, consider dressing in layers depending on the time of day.

name: Surfing Bird's WOK
address: 371B Nguyen Dinh Chieu Across The Street From Dong Vui Foodcourt, Mui Ne, Phan Thiet Vietnam
description: Asian bistro, across the street from Dong Vui. We are open for lunch and dinner, also take away. Welcome)
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Mui Ne
French Restaurants for Breakfast in Mui Ne
example_reviews: This vendor is based in a food court with a large number of other fast food vendors. Their menu is somewhat limited, the prices are average, but the portions are a bit on the small side. We had prawn noodles and chicken cashew (around 90 vnd each) and both thought the food was delicious, but the size meant I had to buy another meal from another vendor.
We experience this small restaurant the first day of Tet ! The owner is really welcoming, food is overall good and prices are reasonable
Had a really nice beef noodles here. It was a bit uncomfortable on Large wooden chairs and no air con (only fans) but the food hit the spot

name: Trinh Restaurant
address: 47 Nguyen Co Thach Street Suoi Nuoc Beach, Mui Ne, Phan Thiet Vietnam
description: Marinade your senses in the positive ambiance that this zesty little Restaurant is serving up this season. Trinh Restaurant is conveniently situated in the tranquil setting of Mui Ne, Vietnam, just a stones throw from the all famous ’Full Moon Village resort and spa’, ‘The Blue Bay Resort’, ‘The Mui Ne Village resort’, and the ‘Long son campgrounds’. Here you’ll sample some of Vietnam’s finest traditional dishes, not to mention a wide selection of sea-food vegetarian & western style dishes. After indulging on MaMa’s delicious home cooking why not try some of our new freshly baked desserts. You can also check out our extensive beverages menu which hosts a range of of hot and cold drinks including, freshly squeezed juices, smoothies, cocktails, beers, wines and spirits. This season also sees the launch of our all new English tea and coffee collection. Here at Trinh Restaurant we take great pride in our business. We aim to guarantee a satisfactory and memorable experience.
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Mui Ne
Late Night Pizza in Mui Ne
Late Night European Restaurants in Mui Ne
example_reviews: A small restaurant with helpful staff and amazing food for a very cheap price. The staff here are honest and serve us even in odd hours.
Hi I’m eight years old and I had the best Burger and fries and EVERYTHING was delicious! Everyone liked the seafoods especially lopsters and crabs..ext so if you are in Mui Ne come to Trinh!

This little family running restaurant located outside the city center serves a really delicious and fresh food. No wander, there are just few steps to the beach. We had a fish some seafood incl. snails and beer. Today in the morning Pho soups and Vietnamese coffee which is great as every day here in Vietnam. A peaceful place with some music to chill. Fully recommended.

name: Cham Garden Restaurant
address: 32 Nguyen Dinh Chieu Ham Tien, Phan Thiet, Phan Thiet Vietnam
description: Cham Garden Restaurant is a quiet refuge in the hustle and bustle of Mui Ne's busy strip. It is located about 100 meters away from the road and is surrounded by a lush tropical garden. With its natural grass roof and being open to three sides, you are protected from the elements, yet you feel like you are sitting outdoors, and no street noise disturbs the relaxing views and romantic, cozy flair. You can choose from an extensive menu, which includes traditional Vietnamese recipes and international dishes as well as own creations that bring together elements of European and Asian cuisine in a perfect fusion.
cuisines: Street Food Restaurants in Phan Thiet
Fast Food Restaurants in Phan Thiet
Indian Restaurants for Large Groups in Phan Thiet
Italian Restaurants for Large Groups in Phan Thiet
example_reviews: We had a pleasant dinner at Cham Garden and our server Năm was very attentive and informative. The food is fresh and delish, the price is not too expensive compared to other resort's restaurant. They have 3 menus varied from Vietnamese cuisine to western food, and every well executed. Protips: call the restaurant to pre-order fresh seafood

I wish we had found this restaurant earlier, having found this on our last night in this area. It is situated from the front on the main street which runs through Mui Ne, but the restaurant is situated in a beautiful garden a distance down from the road, making it a quiet little retreat from all the hustle and bustle. Soft music playing, candle lit, sublime food, and even a decent bottle of wine, something which we have missed during our 4 weeks in Vietnam, reasonably priced too! The food was impeccable, service perfection, instead of the usual Vietnamese style of bringing all the food out as quickly as possible, irrespective of which course it is, or even whether you have finished the earlier course! Time allowed between each course, we wished the meal would never end. Just perfect, you need to go. Forget all the others, this is the place to go, excellent choice, excellent food, excellent service. Perfection.

The restaurant is part of the small but fine "Cham Villas" complex. The restaurant, where you can get breakfast (from 7 a.m.) and lunch, also focuses on high quality. The restaurant is tastefully and discreetly decorated, and breakfast is served here in the form of a buffet. Although the "Cham Villas" can only accommodate around 40 guests, the breakfast buffet offers a very large selection. In addition to cheese, sausage, liver pate, a very good range of fresh fruit, Bircher muesli and juices are offered. This offer is complemented by eggs that can be prepared to your taste and Vietnamese dishes in the form of noodle and rice dishes. Of course there is also a very tasty Pho soup. Since the resort had only a few Vietnamese guests at times, the Asian buffet part was sometimes omitted. However, the staff expressly pointed out that we could also have these dishes freshly prepared. An offer that we always gladly accepted. The preparation was also very quick. To round off breakfast, there are small cakes and muffins available, which are also very pleasantly presented. A big compliment also goes to the attentive staff, who look after the guests attentively and also, a rarity in hotels in Vietnam (German owner), speak understandable English. We were extremely impressed by this magical restaurant. Tien and Phi are always very nice and attentive. Tien even speaks quite good English.

name: Mui Ne Swiss House
address: 187B Nguyen Dinh Chieu, Ham Tien,, Mui Ne, Phan Thiet 800000 Vietnam
description: Swiss House Restaurant located in the Boke seafood areas; the only Swiss restaurant in Mui Ne.
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Mui Ne
BBQ Restaurants for Large Groups in Mui Ne
Cafes for Breakfast in Mui Ne
example_reviews: We were very well received at the Swiss house, despite not having made a booking beforehand. The place was full within a half hour so we felt really lucky. They cater Russian food which I thought was somewhat funny but the Swiss are considered neutral after all. We spent a great and entertaining evening there, had great food and drinks and were very impressed by the speed of the waiters and the kitchen. We’re going to be back again soon.

The food is delicious, the staff friendly and efficient, the owner enthusiastic and the prices moderate. So many reasons to go there as often as possible. I really enjoyed my meal, a steak cooked to perfection and real crispy fries, very rare in Vietnam.

1: Cleanest place (the toilet is finally not Vietnamese) 2: lovely owner. 3: steak on stone for 1000 rubles - absolutely a bomb. The stone is hot on it and you cook the meat to your needs. Burber - the bun is made by the wife, the fries are really something special, the cutlet (I’ve never eaten one like this before)… in short…. This is perhaps the best place in Mui Ne. Located in the central part where there are a lot of restaurants👍🏼

name: CocoSea Restaurant by Hoang Ngoc Resort
address: 152 Nguyễn Đình Chiểu, Hàm Tiến, Phan Thiet 8000000 Vietnam
description: We visited this restaurant over the weekend with a family friend. The food served was exceptional, and I have shared some photos for you to view. The staff were attentive, accommodating, and courteous throughout our dining experience. Our dinner was part of a resort package; however, I was impressed by the high quality they maintained despite it being complimentary. Situated next to the beach, we felt compelled to sample their unique dishes such as the "Sentinel Crab stir-fried with garlic chilly salt." They allowed us to select our own crab ensuring its freshness! I wholeheartedly recommend this resort to all my family and friends as it offers great value for money.
cuisines: Street Food Restaurants in Phan Thiet
Fast Food Restaurants in Phan Thiet
example_reviews: We visited this restaurant over the weekend with a family friend. The food served was exceptional, and I have shared some photos for you to view. The staff were attentive, accommodating, and courteous throughout our dining experience. Our dinner was part of a resort package; however, I was impressed by the high quality they maintained despite it being complimentary. Situated next to the beach, we felt compelled to sample their unique dishes such as the "Sentinel Crab stir-fried with garlic chilly salt." They allowed us to select our own crab ensuring its freshness! I wholeheartedly recommend this resort to all my family and friends as it offers great value for money.

Incredible view to sit facing the water and look out to the horizon as the sun sets. The food was very good, beyond expectations. We ordered cobia fish to share, highly recommend ordering the amount suggested by the waiter, you will be full and satisfied. The fish was served with rosti, super tasty and I was also able to order corn (more than satisfied). Nice staff and worth about SEK 500 that it cost (food, water and 1 beer). Can recommend the restaurant, the only minus was the music that was played. A Christmas song on repeat but we managed to get them to change it and then it was peace and joy, eating and looking out at the sea is life. Nice service with!!! Pass this place if you want to eat food (choose fish/seafood)!!!!

First of all the resort where this restaurant is located is beautifully designed with lush greenery, outdoor pool and one of the few clean beaches with actual sand. The resort has two restaurants, we have been to the seaside one. Relaxed seating next to the beach or air conditioned inside. Food choices are abundant with Vietnamese choices of course, all beautifully assembled and very balanced. We had some grilled chicken which was juicy and came with awesome dips. Grouper cooked in a sweet lemon broth was good and seafood platter and grilled squid was well done! Will go tomorrow again to try the other choices 😜

name: Goa Indian Restaurant
address: 137 Nguyen Dinh Chieu, Mui Ne, Phan Thiet Vietnam
description: Halal food. We are serving North Indian food and South Indian food. Vegetarian, Non.Vegetarian, Vegan food. Shaurma, Fish & Chips, Chicken & Chips. Relaxing atmosphere with friendly service."
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Mui Ne
Italian Restaurants for Lunch in Mui Ne
Late Night Pizza in Mui Ne
example_reviews: I've eaten here twice now and both times have been absolutely fantastic!! Great place to go for a peaceful, chilled meal alone or with friends. I got the chicken jalfrezi (which was packed with flavour), saffron rice, garlic naan and mint tea and everything was TOP NOTCH 👌 Great portion sizes and very reasonably priced! Staff are so lovely and Naz makes you feel very welcome. Would totally recommend this place to anyone who loves a good curry 💪 P.S I'm a 26 year old female, just posting on my mum's account 😊

Not the first time and not the first year we go to this restaurant. The caring owner always turns on the fan in the heat and brings delicious mango lassi. One of the best local Indian cuisines, big portions, hearty dishes

Goa has a low key and very relaxed ambience with nice low lighting and some outside seating. The food is outstanding; as good as any of the dozens of Indian restaurants we have eaten in at home in the UK. The staff are attentive , pleasant and very efficient. The owner, whose name we unfortunately did not get, is a charming and genial host and it was a pleasure to chat with him. And they do very nice cocktails.

name: Modjo Bar & Restaurant
address: 139C Nguyen Đinh Chieu, Mui Ne, Phan Thiet 801094 Vietnam
description: We offer authentic and quality French, Swiss, Vietnamese and Asian cuisine at affordable prices in an elegant and relaxed setting. Our house specialities are Swiss cheese fondue and Swiss raclette, ¨steak¨ and ¨entrecôte¨ on hot stone or assorted cheeses or délicatesses platters. But you will also find all kinds of homemade dishes and desserts to excite your taste buds.
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Mui Ne
Italian Restaurants for Lunch in Mui Ne
Late Night Pizza in Mui Ne
example_reviews: I'm pretty choosy about my cuisine, as I've gone to all the best restaurants in Moscow, but it's just DELICIOUS! It's mandatory to visit! Tartar top, steaks are delicious and unusual serving, tiramisu 10/10.

We went here because my parents wanted to have the hot stone steak where you finish searing your steak on a hot stone on the table. It is a fun gimmick if you like that kind of thing. I ordered the mountain burger. The steak was nice, even if the whole table was enveloped in a cloud of steam from the steaks sizzling away on their stones. One problem was that with the blue, dim lighting - it was impossible to see how well done the steak was. If you want it rare and cut it you will be unable to tell in the low lighting. The burger was not the best I have had, slightly dry and uninspired.

What a great find! We came across this bar/restaurant and it looked inviting, so in we popped just for a couple of drinks. We were so impressed by the place we decided to go the following evening for dinner. We both ordered the Hot Stone dishes. I chose the strip loin and my husband the fillet. The pepper sauce I can honestly say was one of the nicest pepper sauces I’ve had. Both steaks were good quality. The white chocolate dessert was gorgeous. It was their take on a Crème Brûlée! The Managers and their staff were attentive and friendly. We will go back if we are in the area again. Modjo does not disappoint!

name: Sandals
address: 24 Nguyen Dinh Chieu Sailing Club Resort Mui Ne, Phan Thiet Vietnam
description: Rated one of Mui Ne’s best restaurants, Sandals offers beautifully presented, sophisticated takes on Vietnamese and Western cuisine. Using only the freshest, highest-quality ingredients, our talented chefs create delightful meals that put a modern spin on traditional flavours. At Sandals, we put much care and thought into our Innovative food and beverage creations. Our extensive a la carte menu caters to all palates and dietary requirements including gluten-free, vegetarian, and vegan options to go along with simply delicious, wholesome meals. Sandals is known for our homemade specialties, signature dishes and sustainable dining.Enjoy a morning latte or a light, healthy lunch while watching kite-surfers jumping the waves or sip on a refreshing pre-dinner cocktail under a painted orange sky; Sandals always sets the stage for an exquisite dining experience. Whatever your taste, we invite you to sit back, enjoy the ocean breeze, and savour your meal, because life is endlessly delicious!
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Phan Thiet
Street Food Restaurants in Phan Thiet
example_reviews: Absolutely perfect on every level. A beautiful hotel that has been decorated with thought and attention. The staff are wonderful, they simply could not do more to help out. Pool is well kept and the section of beach the hotel has is clean. The poolside restaurant and bar has a great menu and everything we tried was fresh, tasty and well presented. Compared to other resorts in the area it is pricey, but you get what you pay for. Will go back again for sure.

We ate at Sandals twice during our stay in Mui Ne and both times the service and food were excellent. We had the Christmas set menu one night which consisted of a series of traditional Christmas dishes - initially I thought we would have to choose from the options but they gave you everything on the menu in perfect sized portions. Second time we ate from the Al a carte menu. We had the sashimi, prawn poke bowl and seafood pancake as our mains and then we followed it with the brownie and cheesecake. Thom was our waiter both nights and she did a magnificent job - she even remembered our drinks order from the earlier in the week and we were welcomed with a big hello. Stef the operations manager also came and greeted everyone in the restaurant on Christmas evening. The whole experience from beginning to end was wonderful and I would highly recommend eating here when in Mui Ne.

Sandals is the Sailing Club hotel's restaurant, open to all, on the beach. Incidentally, the bungalows scattered in a tropical garden, protected by vegetation, make you want to book here for a future stay. The servers are smiling and professional, one even recognizing our son and his wife who had stayed there for New Year's Eve 2021. Jug water is served free of charge. Unfortunately, I was unwell and was not able to enjoy my dish but I envied my family who enjoyed beautiful plates of mango chicken sandwich and Pork skewers in rice. An address to remember.

name: Ratinger Löwe
address: 32 Nguyen DInh Chieu Street Ham Tien Ward, Phan Thiet Vietnam
description: Ratinger Löwe offers a wide variety of German food. Managed by German chefs who ensure authenticity of dishes according to original recipes, the restaurant is popular with tourists and expats as well as local guests for its high quality cuisine and inviting atmosphere on the patio outside or inside with a more rustic look.
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Phan Thiet
Street Food Restaurants in Phan Thiet
Japanese Restaurants for Lunch in Phan Thiet
Mediterranean Restaurants for Lunch in Phan Thiet
example_reviews: A jewel in Mui Ne – an unforgettable experience! This restaurant was a real favorite of the stay in Mui Ne. Everything is there to spend an exceptional time: a pleasant atmosphere, an ideal location, a team with little care, and above all... an absolutely delicious cuisine! The setting is superb, clean, welcoming, tastefully decorated, and you feel right away. The location is perfect for a gourmet break between walks or at the end of the day. On the kitchen side, each dish was a treat: subtle flavors, fresh products, a beautiful presentation, and a varied menu that makes you want to taste everything. Whether for Vietnamese specialties or more international dishes, everything was mastered perfectly. But what makes the experience truly unique is the quality of service: a staff of rare kindness, smiling, caring, professional and sincerely concerned for the well-being of each client. You feel a real sense of hospitality. In short, this is the kind of restaurant you want to come back to over and over again, and that we recommend to all travelers passing through Mui Ne. A beautiful discovery that deserves 5 stars.

We were received friendly, after which we were given the menu with a lot of choice between Vietnamese cuisine but especially German / European cuisine. We went for the curry sausage and spinach with fried eggs and mashed potatoes. This earned us a big 10! Price quality ratio is very good. The staff is very friendly and makes you feel at home. We definitely recommend this place to eat something different than Vietnamese cuisine.

The wonderful German restaurant is open and not as it says on the page closed. The. Owned by a German-Vietnamese couple who also run the fine bo galows behind the restaurant and a lunch restaurant in the complex itself, we have tried both, re t and nicely eloquent waiters in English and great food.

name: Alex Restaurant
address: 39A Nguyễn Đình Chiểu, Mui Ne, Phan Thiet 801091 Vietnam
description: Restaurant of native Russian cuisine.Salads. Main courses. Beverages. BBQ. Seafood dishes. Free delivery to your hotel.
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Mui Ne
Late Night Asian Restaurants in Mui Ne
Late Night BBQ Restaurants in Mui Ne
example_reviews: Good restaurant that doesn't need to bait tourists in front of their storefront. This place seems known to connoisseurs and it suited us perfectly. Russian dishes (because the restaurant mainly serves Russian customers), but also typical Vietnamese dishes. We were pleasantly surprised at the very reasonable prices.

Although past reviews talked about non-Russians not getting good service we had no problems. We did go for lunch not dinner though and the restaurant wasn’t busy. We had nice salads and wine for a cheap lunch. We left happy!

I was on vacation in Mui Ne, visited quite a few cafes and restaurants, and this place is the best!!! Incredibly delicious food, huge portions, and surprisingly low prices! Positive staff, Russian chefs, super atmosphere! I definitely recommend this restaurant, you won't regret it 🥰

name: Panda Restaurant
address: 25A Nguyen Đinh Chieu Street, Ham Tien Ward Ham Tien, Phan Thiet 54000 Vietnam
description:
The food and the selection is fantastic. We have been here several times and tried different dishes.
The recommendations of the very friendly and courteous owner were always good.
From seafood to traditional Vietnamese dishes, you can eat everything here at very fair prices.
cuisines: Fast Food Restaurants in Phan Thiet
Street Food Restaurants in Phan Thiet
Thai Restaurants for Lunch in Phan Thiet
example_reviews: The food and the selection is fantastic. We have been here several times and tried different dishes. The recommendations of the very friendly and courteous owner were always good. From seafood to traditional Vietnamese dishes, you can eat everything here at very fair prices.

This restaurant is not so appealing at first glance but the food and drinks make up for it. We have always had to wait a bit as the place is obviously very popular. All seafood , especially the springrolls with shrimp exceptionally good. Currys and various fried rice dishes with various side dishes extremely tasty. Value for money is very good .

By far the best restaurant in Mui Ne Have tried three , four others but none came close to this. Were there every day last time. The selection of fresh fish is great and the veggi curry just a highlight:) The first time we ate the water spinach with garlic here, highly recommended. The price performance is bomb. Juices, coconut, beer super good. Juices not diluted. The owner and colleagues are always super friendly and nice Highly recommended

name: Red Pho Cafe
address: 77B Nguyen Dinh Chieu, Phan Thiet 800000 Vietnam
description: Asian and european hits restaurant in the middle of Mui Ne
cuisines: Street Food Restaurants in Phan Thiet
Fast Food Restaurants in Phan Thiet
Japanese Restaurants for Lunch in Phan Thiet
Mediterranean Restaurants for Lunch in Phan Thiet
example_reviews: This cafe was recommended to us by our guide as the best value Price and quality. There is air conditioning, which is a big plus, the portions are medium in size, not huge.
